atk-s0508a12:3_0: Dukanipāte natthi koci bhavo niccotiādikā āyasmato uttarattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:3_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena vicarati.
atk-s0508a12:3_3: Tena ca samayena satthā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṁ vanantare aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṁsiyo vissajjento.
atk-s0508a12:3_4: So antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto ākāsato oruyha suvisuddhehi vipulehi kaṇikārapupphehi bhagavantaṁ pūjesi,
atk-s0508a12:3_5: pupphāni buddhānubhāvena satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṁsu,
atk-s0508a12:3_6: so tena bhiyyosomattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge kālaṁ katvā tāvatiṁse nibbattitvā uḷāraṁ dibbasampattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:3_7: anubhavanto yāvatāyukaṁ tattha ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a12:3_10: So viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ gantvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya vayena sīlācārena ca lokassa sambhāvanīyo jāto.
atk-s0508a12:3_11: Tassa taṁ sampattiṁ disvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṁ dātukāmo hutvā attano adhippāyaṁ pavedesi.
atk-s0508a12:3_12: So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṁ paṭikkhipitvā kālena kālaṁ dhammasenāpatiṁ payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:3_13: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno hutvā theraṁ upaṭṭhahati.
atk-s0508a12:4_0: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno,
atk-s0508a12:4_1: tassa bhesajjatthāya uttaro sāmaṇero pātova pattacīvaramādāya vihārato nikkhanto antarāmagge taḷākassa
atk-s0508a12:4_2: tīre pattaṁ ṭhapetvā udakasamīpaṁ gantvā mukhaṁ dhovati.
atk-s0508a12:4_3: Atha aññataro umaṅgacoro ārakkhapurisehi anubaddho aggadvāreneva nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto attanā
atk-s0508a12:4_4: gahitaṁ ratanabhaṇḍikaṁ sāmaṇerassa patte pakkhipitvā palāyi.
atk-s0508a12:4_6: Coraṁ anubandhantā rājapurisā sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṁ disvā,
atk-s0508a12:4_8: iminā coriyaṁ kata’’nti sāmaṇeraṁ pacchābāhaṁ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:4_9: Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṁ anusāsati.
atk-s0508a12:4_11: suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī’’ti ca baddhāghātattā kammaṁ asodhetvāva jīvantameva taṁ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0508a12:5_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṁ oloketvā taṁ ṭhānaṁ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0508a12:5_1: paggharantajātihiṅgulakasuvaṇṇarasadhāraṁ viya jālāguṇṭhitamudutalunadīghaṅgulihatthaṁ uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā, ‘‘uttara,
atk-s0508a12:5_3: tattha tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā’’ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a12:5_4: Uttaro amatābhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena sañjātappasādasomanassatāya uḷāraṁ pītipāmojjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:5_5: paṭilabhitvā yathāparicitaṁ vipassanāmaggaṁ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṁ gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena
atk-s0508a12:5_6: tāvadeva maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:11_0: Tisūlaṁ sugataṁ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
atk-s0508a12:38_0: ‘‘Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
atk-s0508a12:44_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:46_0: Aññaṁ gatiṁ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:48_0: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:57_0: ‘‘Imaṁ khāda imaṁ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
atk-s0508a12:62_0: ‘‘Sītaṁ uṇhaṁ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:63_0: Atho cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ, hadaye me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a12:79_0: Chaḷabhiñño puna hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a12:79_4: tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ anubhavanto kathaṁ tvaṁ vipassanaṁ anuyuñjituṁ asakkhī’’ti puṭṭho,
atk-s0508a12:79_8: evāhaṁ tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ anubhavantopi asakkhiṁ vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṁ adhigantu’’nti dassento –
atk-s0508a12:81_0: ‘‘Natthi koci bhavo nicco, saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā;
atk-s0508a12:82_0: Uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:87_0: Tattha natthi koci bhavo niccoti kammabhavo upapattibhavo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññībhavo asaññībhavo
atk-s0508a12:87_2: tatthāpi hīno majjhimo ukkaṭṭho dīghāyuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti evaṁvibhāgo yokoci nicco dhuvo
atk-s0508a12:87_3: thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi taṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ paṭicca samuppannattā.
atk-s0508a12:87_5: tasmā saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā natthīti yojanā.
atk-s0508a12:87_6: Paccayehi saṅkhatattā ‘‘saṅkhārā’’ti laddhanāme hi pañcakkhandhe upādāya bhavasamaññāya saṅkhārāva hutvā
atk-s0508a12:87_7: sambhūtā jarāmaraṇena ca vipariṇamantīti asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā.
atk-s0508a12:87_11: Te bhavapariyāyena saṅkhārapariyāyena ca vuttā pañcakkhandhā yathāpaccayaṁ aparāparaṁ uppajjanti,
atk-s0508a12:87_12: uppannā ca jarāya paripīḷitā hutvā cavanti paribhijjantīti attho.
atk-s0508a12:87_14: saṅkhārā’’ti ca laddhavohārā pañcakkhandhā udayabbayasabhāvāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:87_15: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṁ viya saṅkhate ādīnavaṁ dosaṁ pageva
atk-s0508a12:87_16: vipassanāpaññāya jānitvā aniccalakkhaṇehi diṭṭhā saṅkhārā dukkhānattā vibhūtatarā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0508a12:88_0: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṁ viya agāraṁ sappaṭibhayā upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0508a12:88_2: Evaṁ pana sabbaso bhavehi vinivattiyamānassa kāmesu apekkhāya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva,
atk-s0508a12:88_5: Mānusehi viya dibbehipi kāmehi nivattitacittosmīti attho.
atk-s0508a12:88_6: Patto me āsavakkhayoti yasmā evaṁ suparimajjitasaṅkhāro bhavesu suparidiṭṭhādīnavo kāmesu ca anāsattamānaso
atk-s0508a12:88_7: tasmā sūlamatthake nisinnenāpi me mayā patto adhigato āsavakkhayo nibbānaṁ arahattañcāti.
atk-s0508a12:88_8: Aññehi ca sabrahmacārīhi appattamānasehi tadadhigamāya ussāho karaṇīyoti bhikkhūnaṁ ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0508a12:91_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṁ nibbattitvā pabbataguhāyaṁ viharati.
atk-s0508a12:91_3: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṁ kātuṁ gocarāya pakkantakāle sayanaguhaṁ pavisitvā nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0508a12:91_4: Sīho gocaraṁ gahetvā nivatto guhādvāre bhagavantaṁ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṁ katvā
atk-s0508a12:91_5: cittaṁ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhatthāya araññe vāḷamige apanetuṁ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṁ nadanto buddhagatāya
atk-s0508a12:91_9: Bhagavā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā ‘‘vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo’’ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṁ pakkhanditvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0508a12:91_10: Sīho pālileyyakahatthī viya buddhaviyogadukkhaṁ adhivāsetuṁ asakkonto kālaṁ katvā haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule
atk-s0508a12:91_11: nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā
atk-s0508a12:91_12: yāvajīvaṁ puññāni katvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṁ rañño utenassa
atk-s0508a12:91_13: purohitaputto hutvā nibbatti bhāradvājo nāma nāmena.
atk-s0508a12:91_14: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā
atk-s0508a12:91_15: tehi pariccajjanto rājagahaṁ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṁ disvā sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:91_16: bhojane amattaññū hutvā vicaranto satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya patiṭṭhāpito vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:96_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:99_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ‘‘bhagavato sammukhā yaṁ sāvakehi pattabbaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:99_2: bhikkhusaṅghe ca ‘‘yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0508a12:99_7: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīhanādikānaṁ yadidaṁ piṇḍolabhāradvājo’’ti (a. ni. 1.188,
atk-s0508a12:99_9: So ekadivasaṁ attano santikaṁ upagataṁ gihikāle sahāyabhūtaṁ macchariṁ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṁ anukampamāno
atk-s0508a12:99_10: tassa dānakathaṁ kathetvā tena ca ‘‘ayaṁ mama dhanaṁ vināsetukāmo’’ti bhakuṭiṁ katvāpi ‘‘tuyhaṁ ekabhattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:99_12: ‘‘taṁ saṅghassa dehi mā mayha’’nti saṅghassa pariṇāmesi.
atk-s0508a12:99_13: Puna brāhmaṇena ‘‘ayaṁ maṁ bahūnaṁ dāpetukāmo’’ti appaccaye pakāsite dutiyadivasaṁ dhammasenāpatinā saṅghagatāya
atk-s0508a12:99_16: āhārassa pana mayā sabbaso pariññātabhāvaṁ na jānāti,
atk-s0508a12:102_0: Āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esanaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:104_0: ‘‘Paṅkoti hi naṁ avedayuṁ, yāyaṁ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a12:105_0: Sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:107_0: Tattha nayidaṁ anayena jīvitanti idaṁ mama jīvitaṁ anayena añāyena veḷudānapupphadānādianesanāya na hoti jīvitanikantiyā abhāvato.
atk-s0508a12:107_1: Nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro ca āhariyamāno maggaphalañāṇaṁ viya hadayassa cittassa santikaro na hoti,
atk-s0508a12:107_2: kevalaṁ pana sajjukaṁ khudāpaṭighātamattaṁ karotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a12:107_3: Atha vā nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro rasataṇhāvatthu me hadayassa santiko āsatto na hoti rasataṇhāya eva abhāvato.
atk-s0508a12:107_6: tassa āhāro hadayassa santike nāma abhiṇhaṁ manasikātabbato.
atk-s0508a12:107_11: Yadi hi jīvitanikanti āhārarasataṇhā ca natthi,
atk-s0508a12:107_12: atha kasmā piṇḍāya carasīti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo,
atk-s0508a12:107_14: Āhāro bhojanaṁ ṭhiti ṭhānaṁ paccayo etassāti āhāraṭṭhitiko.
atk-s0508a12:107_15: ‘‘Āhārapaṭibaddhavuttiko samussayo kāyo’’iti disvāna evaṁ ñatvā imamatthaṁ buddhiyaṁ ṭhapetvā carāmi esanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:108_0: Paccayanimittaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamanto tattha vandanapūjanāhi lābhasakkārehi ca bajjhatīti evaṁ mādisesu
atk-s0508a12:108_3: yā ayaṁ paccayanimittaṁ upagatānaṁ pabbajitānaṁ kulesu gehavāsīsu pavattissati guṇasambhāvanā pūjanā ca,
atk-s0508a12:108_4: yasmā taṁ abhāvitattānaṁ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malīnabhāvakaraṇena ca paṅko kaddamoti buddhādayo avedayuṁ abbhaññāsuṁ pavedesuṁ vā,
atk-s0508a12:108_5: tasmā sā sappurisānaṁ bandhāya na hoti sakkārāsāya pageva pahīnattā.
atk-s0508a12:108_6: Asappurisassa pana sakkārāsā duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato anto tudanato uddharituṁ asakkuṇeyyato ca sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:108_7: Tato eva tena sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho durubbaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato,
atk-s0508a12:108_9: Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇo there abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:111_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:111_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato tattha nāradaṁ nāma paccekasambuddhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:111_4: rukkhamūle vasantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso naḷehi sālaṁ katvā tiṇehi chādetvā adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:111_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:111_8: So vayappatto yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvā vicaranto kalyāṇamittasaṁsaggena bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a12:111_9: dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:113_0: Sayambhū nārado nāma, rukkhamūle vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a12:129_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā puthujjanakāle attano cittassa rūpādiārammaṇesu yathākāmappavattiyā,
atk-s0508a12:129_1: idāni ariyamaggena niggahitabhāvassa ca vibhāvanena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:134_0: ‘‘Tiṭṭha makkaṭa mā dhāvi, na hi te taṁ yathā pure;
atk-s0508a12:135_0: Niggahītosi paññāya, neva dūraṁ gamissasī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:136_0: Tattha ghaṭṭayantoti attano lolabhāvena rukkhassa aññaṁ sākhaṁ muñcitvā aññassa gahaṇena anekavāraṁ tattha
atk-s0508a12:136_1: rukkhaṁ cālento phalūpabhogamakkaṭo viya tena tena cakkhādidvārena rūpādiārammaṇesu aññaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ
atk-s0508a12:136_2: gaṇhanto cittasantānassa samādānavasena niccalaṁ ṭhātuṁ appadānena abhikkhaṇaṁ ghaṭṭayanto cālento tasmiṁyeva
atk-s0508a12:136_9: ito paṭṭhāya te dhāvituṁ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a12:136_10: tasmā na hi te taṁ yathā pūre yasmā taṁ attabhāvagehaṁ pubbe viya na te sevitaṁ pihitadvārabhāvato,
atk-s0508a12:136_11: kiñca niggahītosi paññāya sayañca idāni maggapaññāya kilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṁ pādānaṁ chedanena accantikaṁ niggahaṁ pattosi,
atk-s0508a12:136_12: tasmā neva dūraṁ gamissasi ito attabhāvato dūraṁ dutiyādiattabhāvaṁ neva gamissasi yāvacarimakacittaṁ eva te gamananti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:139_0: Tiṇṇaṁ me tālapattānantiādikā āyasmato gaṅgātīriyattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:139_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sāsane abhippasanno hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pānīyamadāsi.
atk-s0508a12:139_3: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:139_4: sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa gahapatissa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:139_6: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṁ vasanto agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṁ ajānitvā vītikkamaṁ katvā puna agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_7: ñatvā saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā taṁ kammaṁ jigucchitvā lūkhapaṭipattiṁ anutiṭṭhanto paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ chavasittasadisaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_8: mattikāpattañca gahetvā gaṅgātīre tīhi tālapattehi kuṭikaṁ katvā vihāsi,
atk-s0508a12:139_10: So ‘‘arahattaṁ appatvā na kenaci sallapissāmī’’ti cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāya paṭhamaṁ saṁvaccharaṁ tuṇhībhūto vacībhedaṁ akarontova vihāsi.
atk-s0508a12:139_11: Dutiye saṁvacchare gocaragāme aññatarāya itthiyā ‘‘mūgo nu kho no’’ti vīmaṁsitukāmāya patte khīraṁ āsiñcantiyā hatthavihāre katepi okirite, ‘‘alaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:139_13: Tatiye pana saṁvacchare antaravasseva ghaṭayanto vāyamanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0508a12:147_0: Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā vibhāvanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:153_0: Tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padālito’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:154_1: gaṅgātīre kuṭī katāti tālarukkhato pahitehi tīhi tālapaṇṇehi mayhaṁ vassanapariharaṇatthaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre kuṭikā katā.
atk-s0508a12:156_0: Alaṁ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno’’ti. (theragā. 985; mi. pa. 6.1.1);
atk-s0508a12:157_2: Chavasittova me pattoti mayhaṁ patto chavasittasadiso,
atk-s0508a12:157_4: Paṁsukūlañca cīvaranti cīvarañca me antaramaggasusānādīsu chaḍḍitanantakehi kataṁ paṁsukūlaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:161_0: Api ce hoti tevijjotiādikā āyasmato ajinattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:161_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:161_3: viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato tattha sucintitaṁ nāma paccekasambuddhaṁ ābādhena pīḷitaṁ
atk-s0508a12:161_4: nisinnaṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhesajjatthāya pasannamānaso ghatamaṇḍaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:161_5: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:161_6: sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa daliddabrāhmaṇassa gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi.
atk-s0508a12:161_9: So bhogasaṁvattaniyassa kammassa akatattā daliddakule nibbatto vayappattopi appannapānabhojano hutvā
atk-s0508a12:161_10: vicaranto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a12:165_0: Katattā ācitattā ca, gaṅgā bhāgīrathī ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:177_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvāpi purimakammanissandena appalābhī appaññātova ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:177_2: Kammaphaleneva ca naṁ puthujjanā bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca ‘‘appaññāto’’ti avamaññanti.
atk-s0508a12:182_0: ‘‘Yo ca kho annapānassa, lābhī hotīdha puggalo;
atk-s0508a12:183_0: Pāpadhammopi ce hoti, so nesaṁ hoti sakkato’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:185_7: dibbacakkhuñāṇaṁ pubbenivāsañāṇaṁ āsavakkhayañāṇanti imāsaṁ tissannaṁ vijjānaṁ adhigatattā tevijjo tato
atk-s0508a12:185_8: eva sabbaso kāmāsavādīnaṁ parikkhīṇattā anāsavo āyatiṁ punabbhavassa aggahaṇato maraṇābhāvena maccuhāyī
atk-s0508a12:185_10: evaṁ santepi appaññātoti naṁ bālā avajānanti yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
atk-s0508a12:185_11: taṁ sadatthaṁ anupāpuṇitvā ṭhitampi naṁ uttamaṁ purisaṁ ‘‘dhutavādo bahussuto dhammakathiko’’ti uppannalābhassa
atk-s0508a12:185_12: abhāvato ‘‘na paññāto na pākaṭo’’ti bālā dummedhapuggalā avajānanti, kasmā?
atk-s0508a12:185_13: Ajānatā ajānanakāraṇā guṇānaṁ ajānanameva tattha kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:186_0: Yathā ca guṇānaṁ ajānanato bālā lābhagarutāya sambhāvanīyampi avajānanti,
atk-s0508a12:186_1: evaṁ guṇānaṁ ajānanato lābhagarutāya evaṁ avajānitabbampi sambhāventīti dassento dutiyaṁ gāthaṁ āha.
atk-s0508a12:186_4: tena yathāvuttapuggalato imassa puggalassa vuccamānaṁyeva visesaṁ janeti.
atk-s0508a12:186_9: Jarāmaraṇehi tassa tassa sattāvāsassa pūraṇato galanato ca puggalo.
atk-s0508a12:186_12: yo pana puggalo cīvarādipaccayamattasseva lābhī hoti,
atk-s0508a12:186_14: so pāpicchatāya dussīlabhāvena hīnadhammopi samāno idha imasmiṁ loke bālānaṁ lābhagarutāya sakkato garukato hotīti.
atk-s0508a12:189_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:189_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṁ āmodaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:189_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ khattiyakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:189_5: meḷajinoti laddhanāmo vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato paṇḍito byatto disāsu pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:189_6: So bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane viharante vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:189_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:197_1: kiṁ tayā uttarimanussadhammo adhigato’’ti puṭṭho sīhanādaṁ nadanto –
atk-s0508a12:203_0: Magge paṭipadāyaṁ vā, kaṅkhā mayhaṁ na vijjatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:204_10: yato pabhuti ahaṁ satthuno dhammaṁ desentassa catusaccadhammaṁ assosiṁ sotadvārānusārena upadhāresiṁ upalabhiṁ,
atk-s0508a12:204_11: tato paṭṭhāya anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammānaṁ sayambhūñāṇena jānanato sabbaññū anāvaraṇadassāvimhi,
atk-s0508a12:204_12: pañcannampi mārānaṁ abhibhavanato tehi aparājitattā sadevake loke appaṭihatadhammacakkattā ca aparājite,
atk-s0508a12:204_15: aññehi duddamānaṁ purisadammānaṁ saraṇato accantikena damathena damanato sārathīnaṁ pavarabhūte uttame sammāsambuddhe ,
atk-s0508a12:204_16: ‘‘buddho nu kho no nu kho’’ti kaṅkhaṁ nābhijānāmi aparappaccayabhāvato.
atk-s0508a12:204_17: Tathārūpe desite ariyamagge tadupādāyabhūtāya ca sīlādipaṭipadāya ‘‘niyyāniko nu kho na nu kho’’ti kaṅkhā vicikicchā na vijjati natthīti.
atk-s0508a12:204_18: Ettha ca ariyadhamme saṁsayābhāvakathanena ariyasaṅghepi saṁsayābhāvo kathitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ tattha patiṭṭhitassa anaññathābhāvatoti.
atk-s0508a12:207_0: Yathā agāraṁ ducchannantiādikā āyasmato rādhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:207_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto vihāraṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a12:207_3: satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno satthārā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ paṭibhāneyyakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a12:207_4: ṭhapiyamānaṁ disvā sayaṁ taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā mahādānaṁ pavattesi.
atk-s0508a12:207_6: So evaṁ katapaṇidhāno tato cuto tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:207_7: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso madhurāni ambaphalānī adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:207_8: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:207_9: kāle rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā rādhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto hutvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto mahallakakāle
atk-s0508a12:207_12: pabbajissāmī’’ti vihāraṁ gantvā there bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yācitvā tehi ‘‘ayaṁ brāhmaṇo jiṇṇo
atk-s0508a12:207_13: na sakkoti vattapaṭivattaṁ pūretu’’nti paṭikkhitto satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano ajjhāsayaṁ pavedetvā
atk-s0508a12:207_14: satthārā upanissayasampattiṁ oloketvā āṇattena dhammasenāpatinā pabbājito vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:213_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthu santikāvacaro hutvā vicaranto satthu dhammadesanāpaṭibhānassa paccayabhūtānaṁ paṭibhānajānanakānaṁ aggo jāto.
atk-s0508a12:213_1: Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca āgamma dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti.
atk-s0508a12:213_5: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭibhāneyyakānaṁ yadidaṁ rādho’’ti (a. ni. 1.219, 233).
atk-s0508a12:213_6: So ekadivasaṁ ‘‘ime sattā abhāvanāya rāgena abhibhuyyanti,
atk-s0508a12:213_7: bhāvanāya sati taṁ natthī’’ti bhāvanaṁ thomento ‘‘yathā agāra’’ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a12:214_4: Abhāvitanti taṁ agāraṁ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya rahitattā abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:214_5: Rāgo samativijjhatīti na kevalaṁ rāgova dosamohamānādayopi sabbakilesā tathārūpaṁ cittaṁ ativijjhantiyeva.
atk-s0508a12:214_7: evarūpaṁ cittaṁ succhannaṁ gehaṁ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṁ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0508a12:217_0: Khīṇāhi mayhaṁ jātītiādikā āyasmato surādhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:217_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:217_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso mātuluṅgaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:217_4: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:217_5: anantaraṁ vuttassa rādhattherassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:217_7: So jeṭṭhabhātari rādhe pabbajite sayampi pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:222_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:225_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṁ aññaṁ byākaronto ‘‘khīṇā hī mayha’’ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a12:226_3: Vusitaṁ jinasāsananti jinassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṁ maggabrahmacariyaṁ vuṭṭhaṁ parivuṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:226_4: Pahīno jālasaṅkhātoti sattasantānassa ottharaṇato nissarituṁ appadānato ca ‘‘jālasaṅkhāto’’ti ca laddhanāmā
atk-s0508a12:226_5: diṭṭhi avijjā ca pahīnā maggena samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a12:226_6: Bhavanetti samūhatāti kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa nayanato pavattanato bhavanettisaññitā taṇhā samugghāṭitā.
atk-s0508a12:226_7: Yassatthāya pabbajitoti yassa atthāya yadatthaṁ ahaṁ agārasmā gehato anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ pabbajito upagato.
atk-s0508a12:226_8: So sabbesaṁ orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyappabhedānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ bandhanānaṁ khayabhūto attho nibbānasaṅkhāto
atk-s0508a12:226_9: paramattho arahattasaṅkhāto sadattho ca mayā anuppatto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:229_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto vipassissa
atk-s0508a12:229_3: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso āmodaphalamadāsi.
atk-s0508a12:229_4: Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:229_5: rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gotamoti laddhanāmo sattavassikakāle upanayanaṁ katvā ratanabhikkhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:229_6: caritvā sahassaṁ labhitvā taṁ tādise ṭhāne ṭhapetvā vataṁ caranto soḷasasattarasavassuddesikakāle akalyāṇamittehi
atk-s0508a12:229_7: kāmesu parinīyamāno ekissā rūpūpajīviniyā taṁ sahassabhaṇḍikaṁ datvā brahmacariyavināsaṁ patvā tāya cassa
atk-s0508a12:229_8: brahmacārirūpaṁ disvā virattākāre dassite ekarattivāseneva nibbinnarūpo attano brahmacariyanivāsaṁ dhanajāniñca
atk-s0508a12:229_10: Satthā tassa hetusampattiṁ cittācārañca ñatvā tassa āsannaṭṭhāne attānaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a12:229_13: So dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:235_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmentaṁ eko gihisahāyo upagantvā, ‘‘āvuso,
atk-s0508a12:235_1: tayā ratanabhikkhāya laddhaṁ pabbajanto kiṁ akāsī’’ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a12:235_2: Taṁ sutvā thero ‘‘idaṁ nāma kata’’nti anācikkhitvā mātugāme dosaṁ pakāsetvā attano vītarāgabhāvena aññaṁ
atk-s0508a12:236_2: ye itthīsu na bajjhareti ye itthīsu visayabhūtāsu nimittabhūtāsu vā rāgabandhanena na bajjhanti,
atk-s0508a12:236_3: te munayo tapassino saṁyatindriyā sukhaṁ supanti sukhaṁ viharanti,
atk-s0508a12:236_7: Itthiyo hi sattabhūmike nippurise pāsāde uparibhūmiyaṁ vasāpetvāpi,
atk-s0508a12:236_9: tasmā tā kiṭṭhādigāviyo viya sabbakālaṁ rakkhaṇīyā honti.
atk-s0508a12:236_10: Bahucittatāya vā sāmikena vatthālaṅkārānuppadānādinā cittaññathattato sabbakālaṁ rakkhitabbā.
atk-s0508a12:236_11: Sarīrasabhāvaṁ vā mālāgandhādīhi paṭicchādanavasena rakkhitabbacittatāya rakkhitabbāti.
atk-s0508a12:236_12: Yāsu saccaṁ sudullabhanti yāsu saccavacanaṁ laddhuṁ na sakkā,
atk-s0508a12:236_18: Tasmā evarūpā itthiyo vajjetvā ṭhitā munayo sukhitā vatāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:237_1: Idāni yassa appahīnattā evarūpāsu itthīsupi bajjhanti,
atk-s0508a12:237_2: tassa kāmassa attano suppahīnataṁ accantaniṭṭhitatañca dassento dutiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:237_3: Vadhaṁ carimha te kāmāti ambho kāma,
atk-s0508a12:237_7: Anaṇā dāni te mayanti idāni aggamaggapattito paṭṭhāya iṇabhāvakarāya pahīnattā kāma te anaṇā mayaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:237_9: Avītarāgo hi rāgassa vase vattanato tassa iṇaṁ dhārento viya hoti,
atk-s0508a12:237_10: vītarāgo pana taṁ atikkamitvā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato.
atk-s0508a12:237_12: yattha gantvā na socati yasmiṁ nibbāne gamanahetu sabbaso sokahetūnaṁ abhāvato na socati,
atk-s0508a12:237_13: taṁ anupādisesanibbānameva idāni gacchāma anupāpuṇāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:240_0: Pubbe hanati attānanti āyasmato vasabhattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:240_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:240_3: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā nekkhammajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṁ pahāya
atk-s0508a12:240_4: tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā cuddasasahassatāpasaparivāro himavantassa avidūre samagge nāma pabbate assamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_5: kāretvā vasanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tāpasānaṁ ovādānusāsaniyo dento ekadivasaṁ evaṁ cintesi –
atk-s0508a12:240_6: ‘‘ahaṁ kho dāni imehi tāpasehi sakkato garukato pūjito viharāmi,
atk-s0508a12:240_8: dukkho kho panāyaṁ loke yadidaṁ agaruvāso’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:240_9: Evaṁ pana cintetvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya purimabuddhānaṁ cetiye attanā kataṁ pūjāsakkāraṁ anussaritvā
atk-s0508a12:240_10: ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiyaṁ katvā pūjaṁ kareyya’’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho iddhiyā pulinathūpaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_11: suvaṇṇamayaṁ māpetvā suvaṇṇamayādīhi tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasikaṁ pūjaṁ karonto yāvatāyukaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a12:240_12: katvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṁ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0508a12:240_13: Tatthapi yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato cuto tāvatiṁse nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_14: buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ licchavirājakule nibbattitvā vasabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane
atk-s0508a12:240_15: buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:246_0: Sabbo jano maṁ pūjeti, nāhaṁ pūjemi kiñcanaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:247_0: ‘‘Na me ovādako atthi, vattā koci na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:250_0: So me ācariyo natthi, vanavāso niratthako.
atk-s0508a12:258_0: Tesaṁ etādiso thūpo, taṁ nimittaṁ karomahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:266_0: Kilese saṁvaseyyāsi, na yuttaṁ tava mārisa.
atk-s0508a12:267_0: ‘‘Saha āvajjite thūpe, gāravaṁ hoti me tadā;
atk-s0508a12:278_0: Gatte sedā na muccanti, suppabhāso bhavāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:280_0: Thūpaṁ katvāna pulinaṁ, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:282_0: Natthi khettaṁ akhettaṁ vā, paṭipattīva sādhakā.
atk-s0508a12:287_0: ‘‘Tatheva me kataṁ kammaṁ, parittaṁ thokakañca yaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:291_0: ‘‘Saddhā mātā pitā mayhaṁ, buddhassa saraṇaṁ gatā;
atk-s0508a12:308_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā dāyakānuggahaṁ karonto tehi upanīte paccaye na paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a12:308_2: Taṁ puthujjanā ‘‘ayaṁ kāyadaḷhibahulo arakkhitacitto’’ti maññamānā avamaññanti.
atk-s0508a12:308_4: Tassa pana avidūre aññataro kuhakabhikkhu pāpiccho samāno appiccho viya santuṭṭho viya attānaṁ dassento lokaṁ vañcento viharati.
atk-s0508a12:308_6: Athassa sakko devānamindo taṁ pavattiṁ ñatvā theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bhante,
atk-s0508a12:310_0: ‘‘Pubbe hanati attānaṁ, pacchā hanati so pare;
atk-s0508a12:314_0: Yasmiṁ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī’’ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a12:315_0: Tattha pubbe hanati attānanti kuhakapuggalo attano kuhakavuttiyā lokaṁ vañcento pāpicchatādīhi pāpadhammehi paṭhamameva attānaṁ hanati,
atk-s0508a12:315_2: Pacchā hanati so pareti so kuhako paṭhamaṁ tāva vuttanayena attānaṁ hantvā pacchā pare yehi ‘‘ayaṁ bhikkhu
atk-s0508a12:315_3: pesalo ariyo’’ti vā sambhāventehi kārā katā,
atk-s0508a12:315_4: te hanati tesaṁ kārāni attani katāni amahapphalāni katvā paccayavināsanena vināseti.
atk-s0508a12:315_5: Satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane attahanane pana ayaṁ visesoti dassento āha suhataṁ hanti attānanti.
atk-s0508a12:315_6: So kuhako attānaṁ hananto suhataṁ katvā hanti vināseti,
atk-s0508a12:315_11: Yathā tena vītaṁsasakuṇena aññe sakuṇe vañcetvā hananto attānaṁ idha lokepi hanati viññugarahasāvajjasabhāvādinā,
atk-s0508a12:315_13: na pana te sakuṇe pacchā hantuṁ sakkoti,
atk-s0508a12:315_14: evaṁ kuhakopi kohaññena lokaṁ vañcetvā idha lokepi attānaṁ hanati vippaṭisāraviññugarahādīhi,
atk-s0508a12:315_16: na pana te paccayadāyake apāyadukkhaṁ pāpeti.
atk-s0508a12:315_17: Apica kuhako dakkhiṇāya amahapphalabhāvakaraṇeneva dāyakaṁ hanatīti vutto,
atk-s0508a12:315_20: ‘‘dussīlassa manussabhūtassa dānaṁ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.379).
atk-s0508a12:316_0: Evaṁ bāhiraparimajjanamatte ṭhitā puggalā suddhā nāma na honti,
atk-s0508a12:316_1: abbhantarasuddhiyā eva pana suddhā hontīti dassento ‘‘na brāhmaṇo’’ti dutiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:316_10: Taṁ sutvā sakko kuhakabhikkhuṁ tajjetvā ‘‘dhamme vattāhī’’ti ovaditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0508a12:321_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kumbhakārakule
atk-s0508a12:321_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto kumbhakārakammena jīvanto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṁ mattikāpattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:321_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā
atk-s0508a12:321_6: brāhmaṇiyā putto sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:321_8: So vayappatto dhammasenāpatiṁ anupabbajitvā taṁ nissāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:327_0: Rūpimaye ca sovaṇṇe, taṭṭike ca maṇīmaye.
atk-s0508a12:334_0: ‘‘Yāvatā khettā vijjanti, saṅghāpi ca gaṇāpi ca;
atk-s0508a12:341_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṁ garūpanissayaṁ vivekavāsañca kittento –
atk-s0508a12:344_0: Paññāya atthaṁ jānāti, ñāto attho sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a12:347_0: Sace ratiṁ nādhigaccheyya tattha, saṅghe vase rakkhitatto satīmā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:349_2: Diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañhi atthaṁ sotumicchantena kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā
atk-s0508a12:349_3: yadā te payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kañci upanisīditukāmā honti,
atk-s0508a12:349_4: atha ne upanisīditvā adhigatāya sotumicchāya ohitasotena sotabbaṁ hotīti garusannivāsopi sussūsāhetutāya ‘‘sussūsā’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0508a12:349_5: Sā panāyaṁ sussūsā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṁyuttaṁ sutaṁ taṁsamaṅgino puggalassa vaḍḍheti brūhetīti sutavaddhanī,
atk-s0508a12:349_7: Sutaṁ paññāya vaddhananti yaṁ taṁ ‘‘sutadharo sutasannicayo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.339; a. ni.
atk-s0508a12:349_8: 4.22) ‘‘idhekaccassa bahukaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇa’’nti (a. ni.
atk-s0508a12:349_10: taṁ akusalappahānakusalādhigamanahetubhūtaṁ paññaṁ vaddhetīti sutaṁ paññāya vaddhanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:351_0: Paññāya atthaṁ jānātīti bahussuto sutamayañāṇe ṭhito taṁ paṭipattiṁ paṭipajjanto sutānusārena atthūpaparikkhāya
atk-s0508a12:351_1: dhammanijjhānena bhāvanāya ca lokiyalokuttarabhedaṁ diṭṭhadhammādivibhāgaṁ dukkhādivibhāgañca atthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:352_0: ‘‘Sutassa yathāpariyattassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.6).
atk-s0508a12:353_6: pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0508a12:353_7: paññāya ca naṁ ativijjha passatī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-s0508a12:354_0: Ñāto attho sukhāvahoti yathāvutto diṭṭhadhammikādiattho ceva dukkhādiattho ca yāthāvato ñāto adhigato
atk-s0508a12:355_0: Ṭhitāya bhāvanāpaññāya sutamatteneva na sijjhatīti tassā paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassento ‘‘sevetha…pe…vippamokkha’’nti āha.
atk-s0508a12:355_2: Tena saṁyojanappahānassa ca vakkhamānattā vivekārahasseva vivekavāsoti sīlasaṁvarādayo idha avuttasiddhā veditabbā.
atk-s0508a12:355_3: Careyya saṁyojanavippamokkhanti yathā saṁyojanehi cittaṁ vippamuccati,
atk-s0508a12:355_4: tathā vipassanābhāvanaṁ maggabhāvanañca careyya paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:355_5: Sace ratiṁ nādhigaccheyya tatthāti tesu pantasenāsanesu yathāladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu ca ratiṁ pubbenāparaṁ
atk-s0508a12:355_7: saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe rakkhitatto kammaṭṭhānaparigaṇhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvāresu satiārakkhāya upaṭṭhapanena satimā vaseyya vihareyya,
atk-s0508a12:355_8: evaṁ viharantassa ca api nāma saṁyojanavippamokkho bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a12:358_0: Ye kho teti āyasmato jotidāsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:358_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:358_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannacitto kāsumārikaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:358_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde pādiyatthajanapade vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:358_6: So viññutaṁ patvā gharamāvasanto ekadivasaṁ mahākassapattheraṁ attano gāme piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a12:358_7: bhojetvā therassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā attano gāmasamīpe pabbate mahantaṁ vihāraṁ kāretvā theraṁ tattha
atk-s0508a12:358_8: vāsetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto therassa dhammadesanāya paṭiladdhasaṁvego pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:363_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:366_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā visesato vinayapiṭake sukusalabhāvaṁ patvā dasavassiko
atk-s0508a12:366_1: parisupaṭṭhāko ca hutvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavantaṁ vandituṁ sāvatthiṁ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0508a12:366_2: addhānaparissamavinodanatthaṁ titthiyānaṁ ārāmaṁ pavisitvā ekamantaṁ nisinno ekaṁ pañcatapaṁ tapantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:367_0: ‘‘Kopo ca issā paraheṭhanā ca, māno ca sārambhamado pamādo;
atk-s0508a12:368_0: Taṇhā avijjā bhavasaṅgatī ca, te tappanīyā na hi rūpakhandho’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:369_1: Taṁ sutvā so brāhmaṇo tasmiṁ titthiyārāme sabbe aññatitthiyā ca therassa santike pabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:369_2: Thero tehi saddhiṁ sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ vanditvā katipāhaṁ tattha vasitvā attano jātibhūmiṁyeva
atk-s0508a12:369_3: gato dassanatthaṁ upagatesu ñātakesu nānāladdhike yaññasuddhike ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:371_0: ‘‘Ye kho te veṭhamissena, nānattena ca kammunā;
atk-s0508a12:373_0: Tepi tattheva kīranti, na hi kammaṁ panassati.
atk-s0508a12:375_0: ‘‘Yaṁ karoti naro kammaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ yadi pāpakaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:376_0: Tassa tasseva dāyādo, yaṁ yaṁ kammaṁ pakubbatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:377_7: Nānattena ca kammunāti hananaghātanahatthapādādicchedanena khuddakaseḷadānādinā ca nānāvidhena parūpaghātakammena.
atk-s0508a12:377_14: Tepi tattheva kīrantīti te vuttappakārā puggalā yāhi kammakāraṇāhi aññe bādhiṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:377_15: Tattheva tāsuyeva kāraṇāsu sayampi kīranti pakkhipīyanti,
atk-s0508a12:377_21: Na hi kammaṁ panassati kammañhi ekantaṁ upacitaṁ vipākaṁ adatvā na vigacchati,
atk-s0508a12:378_0: Idāni ‘‘na hi kammaṁ panassatī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vibhajitvā sattānaṁ kammassakataṁ vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘yaṁ karotī’’ti gāthaṁ abhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:378_2: yadi vā pāpakaṁ akusalaṁ satto karoti,
atk-s0508a12:378_3: karonto ca tattha yaṁ kammaṁ yathā phaladānasamatthaṁ hoti,
atk-s0508a12:378_5: Tassa tasseva dāyādoti tassa tasseva kammaphalassa gaṇhanato tena tena kammena dātabbavipākassa bhāgī hotīti attho.
atk-s0508a12:378_9: Imā gāthā sutvā therassa ñātakā kammassakatāyaṁ patiṭṭhahiṁsūti.
atk-s0508a12:381_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto paresaṁ bhatako
atk-s0508a12:381_3: hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ sujātassa nāma satthusāvakassa paṁsukūlaṁ pariyesantassa upaḍḍhadussaṁ pariccaji.
atk-s0508a12:381_4: So tena puññakammena tāvatiṁsesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:381_5: kosalarañño gāmabhojakassa coravosāsakassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:381_7: So vayappatto pitu accayena raññā tasmiṁyeva gāmabhojakaṭṭhāne ṭhapito jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:381_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho attano kaniṭṭhassa taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ dāpetvā rājānaṁ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:397_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṁ tato kammato nivattetukāmo tasmiṁyeva kamme abhirataṁ disvā taṁ codento –
atk-s0508a12:402_0: ‘‘Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṁ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0508a12:403_0: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṁ hoti, vipāko hissa pāpako’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:405_6: jāyasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca upapajjasi cā’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:405_7: Āyu khīyati maccānanti maritabbasabhāvattā maccāti laddhanāmānaṁ imesaṁ sattānaṁ āyu ‘‘yo ciraṁ jīvati,
atk-s0508a12:405_8: so vassasataṁ appaṁ vā bhiyyo’’ti (dī. ni. 2.91; saṁ. ni. 2.143; a. ni.
atk-s0508a12:405_9: 7.74) evaṁ paricchinnakālaparamāyu khīyati khayañca sambhedañca gacchati,
atk-s0508a12:405_11: Kunnadīnaṁva odakaṁ yathā nāma kunnadīnaṁ pabbateyyānaṁ khuddakanadīnaṁ udakaṁ ciraṁ na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0508a12:405_14: evaṁ sattānaṁ āyu lahutaraṁ khīyati khayaṁ gacchati.
atk-s0508a12:406_1: karaṁ bālo na bujjhatīti evaṁ saṁsāre aniccepi samāne bālo lobhavasena vā kodhavasena vā pāpāni kammāni karoti,
atk-s0508a12:406_3: pāpaṁ karonto ca ‘‘pāpaṁ karomī’’ti abujjhanako nāma natthi,
atk-s0508a12:406_4: ‘‘imassa kammassa evarūpo dukkho vipāko’’ti pana ajānanato ‘‘na bujjhatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:406_5: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṁ hotīti yadipi pāpassa kammassa āyūhanakkhaṇe ‘‘imassa kammassa evarūpo vipāko’’ti na bujjhati,
atk-s0508a12:406_6: tato pacchā pana nirayādīsu nibbattassa assa bālassa kaṭukaṁ aniṭṭhaṁ dukkhameva hoti.
atk-s0508a12:406_7: Vipāko hissa pāpako yasmā assa pāpakammassa nāma vipāko pāpako nihīno aniṭṭho evāti.
atk-s0508a12:406_8: Imaṁ pana ovādaṁ sutvā therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā rājānaṁ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva sadatthaṁ nipphādesi.
atk-s0508a12:409_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:409_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso ekadivasaṁ kiṁsukarukkhaṁ pupphitaṁ disvā pupphāni
atk-s0508a12:409_4: gahetvā satthāraṁ uddissa ākāse khipitvā pūjesi.
atk-s0508a12:409_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:409_6: somamittoti laddhanāmo tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā vimalena nāma therena kataparicayattā abhiṇhaṁ tassa
atk-s0508a12:409_7: santikaṁ gacchanto dhammaṁ sutvā sāsane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vattapaṭivattaṁ pūrento vicarati.
atk-s0508a12:409_8: Vimalatthero pana kusīto middhabahulo rattindivaṁ vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a12:409_9: Somamitto ‘‘kusītaṁ nāma nissāya ko guṇo’’ti taṁ pahāya mahākassapattheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde
atk-s0508a12:409_10: ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:418_0: ‘‘Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a12:419_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
atk-s0508a12:420_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vimalattheraṁ ovādena tajjento –
atk-s0508a12:427_0: Niccaṁ āraddhavīriyehi, paṇḍitehi sahāvase’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:428_1: yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti pesalopi kulaputto kusītaṁ alasapuggalaṁ nissāya sīdati saṁsāre patati,
atk-s0508a12:428_4: tasmā taṁ adhikusaladhammavasena sīsaṁ anukkhipitvā kucchitaṁ sīdanato kusītaṁ vīriyārambhābhāvato hīnavīriyaṁ puggalaṁ sabbathā vajjeyya,
atk-s0508a12:429_0: Evaṁ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya kosajje ādīnavaṁ dassetvā idāni vīriyārambhe ānisaṁse dassetuṁ ‘‘pavivittehī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:429_4: nibbānaṁ patipesitattatāya pahitattā ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyino,
atk-s0508a12:429_7: tehiyeva saha āvaseyya sadatthaṁ nipphādetukāmo saṁvaseyyāti.
atk-s0508a12:429_8: Taṁ sutvā vimalatthero saṁviggamānaso vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā sadatthaṁ ārādhesi.
atk-s0508a12:432_0: Jano janamhi sambaddhoti āyasmato sabbamittattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:432_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa
atk-s0508a12:432_3: bhagavato kāle nesādakule nibbattitvā vanacāriko hutvā vane mige vadhitvā maṁsaṁ khādanto jīvati.
atk-s0508a12:432_4: Athassa bhagavā anuggaṇhanatthaṁ vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe tīṇi padacetiyāni dassetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a12:432_5: So atītakāle sammāsambuddhesu kataparicayattā cakkaṅkitāni disvā pasannamānaso koraṇḍapupphehi pūjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:432_6: katvā tena puññakammena tāvatiṁsabhavane nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:432_9: So viññutaṁ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0508a12:432_10: araññe viharanto vassaṁ upagantvā vuṭṭhavasso bhagavantaṁ vandituṁ sāvatthiṁ gacchanto antarāmagge māgavikehi
atk-s0508a12:432_12: Mātā panassa migī pāsaṁ appaviṭṭhāpi puttasinehena dūraṁ na gacchati,
atk-s0508a12:432_13: maraṇabhayena pāsasamīpampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhīto ito cito ca parivattento karuṇaṁ vilapati,
atk-s0508a12:432_15: ‘‘aho sattānaṁ snehahetukaṁ dukkha’’nti gacchanto tato paraṁ sambahule core ekaṁ purisaṁ jīvagāhaṁ gahetvā palālaveṇiyā sarīraṁ veṭhetvā jhāpente,
atk-s0508a12:432_16: tañca mahāviravaṁ viravantaṁ disvā tadubhayaṁ nissāya sañjātasaṁvego tesaṁ corānaṁ suṇantānaṁyeva –
atk-s0508a12:435_0: Jano janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano janaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:437_0: ‘‘Ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vā;
atk-s0508a12:438_0: Janaṁ ohāya gacchaṁ taṁ, heṭhayitvā bahuṁ jana’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:439_7: ahaṁ ime nissāya jīvāmī’’ti paṭibaddhacittoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:439_9: dhītā’’tiādinā aññameva janaṁ añño jano assito taṇhāya allīno pariggayha ṭhito.
atk-s0508a12:439_11: heṭheti ca jano jananti kammassakatāya yathābhūtāvabodhassa ca abhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṁ akatvā lobhavasena yathā jano janaṁ assito,
atk-s0508a12:439_12: evaṁ dosavasena jano janena heṭhīyati vibādhīyati.
atk-s0508a12:439_13: ‘‘Tayidaṁ mayhaṁva upari heṭhanaphalavasena paripatissatī’’ti ajānanto heṭheti ca jano janaṁ.

atk-s0508a12:456_0: Te pana corā therassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā saṁvegajātā pabbajitvā dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjiṁsūti.
atk-s0508a12:459_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:459_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato tattha aññatarassa rukkhassa sākhāya olambamānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_4: paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ disvā ‘‘ariyaddhajo olambatī’’ti pasannacitto kiṅkaṇipupphāni gahetvā paṁsukūlaṁ pūjesi.
atk-s0508a12:459_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde setabyanagare satthavāhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:459_6: mahākāḷoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṁ gahetvā vāṇijjavasena
atk-s0508a12:459_7: sāvatthiṁ gato ekamantaṁ sakaṭasatthaṁ nivesetvā addhānaparissamaṁ vinodetvā attano parisāya saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_8: nisinno sāyanhasamayaṁ gandhamālādihatthe upāsake jetavanaṁ gacchante disvā sayampi tehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_9: gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sosānikaṅgaṁ adhiṭṭhāya susāne vasati.
atk-s0508a12:459_10: Athekadivasaṁ kāḷī nāma ekā itthī chavaḍāhikā therassa kammaṭṭhānatthāya aciramatasarīraṁ ubho satthī
atk-s0508a12:459_11: bhinditvā ubho ca bāhū bhinditvā sīsañca dadhithālakaṁ viya bhinditvā sabbaṁ aṅgapaccaṅgaṁ sambandhameva
atk-s0508a12:459_12: katvā therassa oloketuṁ yogyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
atk-s0508a12:461_0: ‘‘Kāḷī itthī brahatī dhaṅkarūpā, satthiñca bhetvā aparañca satthiṁ;
atk-s0508a12:462_0: Bāhañca bhetvā aparañca bāhaṁ, sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṁva;
atk-s0508a12:465_0: ‘‘Yo ve avidvā upadhiṁ karoti, punappunaṁ dukkhamupeti mando;
atk-s0508a12:466_0: Tasmā pajānaṁ upadhiṁ na kayirā, māhaṁ puna bhinnasiro sayissa’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:468_4: Satthiñca bhetvāti matasarīrassa satthiṁ jaṇṇubhedanena bhañjitvā.
atk-s0508a12:468_7: Sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṁvāti matasarīrassa sīsaṁ bhinditvā bhinnattā eva leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paggharantaṁ dadhithālakaṁ viya,
atk-s0508a12:468_9: Esā nisinnā abhisandahitvāti chinnabhinnāvayavaṁ matasarīraṁ te avayave yathāṭhāneyeva ṭhapanena sandahitvā
atk-s0508a12:468_10: sahitaṁ katvā maṁsāpaṇaṁ pasārentī viya esā nisinnā.
atk-s0508a12:469_0: Yo ve avidvā upadhiṁ karotīti yo imāya upaṭṭhāpitaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ disvāpi avidvā akusalo kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:469_2: so mando mandapañño saṁsārassa anativattanato punappunaṁ aparāparaṁ nirayādīsu dukkhaṁ upeti.
atk-s0508a12:469_3: Tasmā pajānaṁ upadhiṁ na kayirāti tasmāti yasmā cetadevaṁ, tasmā.
atk-s0508a12:469_4: Pajānaṁ upadhinti ‘‘idha yaṁ dukkhaṁ sambhotī’’ti pajānanto yoniso manasikaronto kilesūpadhiṁ na kayirā na uppādeyya. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a12:469_5: Māhaṁ puna bhinnasiro sayissanti yathayidaṁ matasarīraṁ bhinnasarīraṁ sayati,
atk-s0508a12:469_6: evaṁ kilesūpadhīhi saṁsāre punappunaṁ uppattiyā kaṭasivaḍḍhako hutvā bhinnasiro ahaṁ mā sayissanti.
atk-s0508a12:469_7: Evaṁ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:481_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0508a12:481_3: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā kāmesu ādīnavaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a12:481_4: gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane sālavane assamaṁ kāretvā vasati.

atk-s0508a12:481_6: So assamato nikkhamitvā phalāphalatthāya gacchanto bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso cattāro daṇḍe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:481_7: bhagavato upari pupphitāhi sālasākhāhi sākhāmaṇḍapaṁ katvā sattāhaṁ navanavehi sālapupphehi bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:481_9: Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cintesi.
atk-s0508a12:481_11: Bhagavā tassa bhāviniṁ sampattiṁ vibhāvento anumodanaṁ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a12:481_12: So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a12:481_13: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tissoti laddhanāmo vayappatto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0508a12:481_14: mante vācento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:481_15: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.

atk-s0508a12:507_0: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.

atk-s0508a12:547_3: evaṁ vevaṇṇiyaṁ ajjhupagato parāyattavuttiko pabbajito sace annapānādīnaṁ lābhī hoti,

atk-s0508a12:547_7: hadaye ṭhapetvā anavajjuppādassāpi uppannassa lābhassa parivajjanena appalābho,
atk-s0508a12:547_9: saṁsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya vā bhikkhu santuṭṭhiṭṭhānīyassa satisampajaññassa vasena sato hutvā paribbaje careyya vihareyyāti.
atk-s0508a12:547_10: Taṁ sutvā te bhikkhū tāvadeva theraṁ khamāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:550_2: Tassa pubbayogo saṁveguppatti pabbajjā ca ekakanipāte ‘‘abhisatto’’ti gāthāya saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttāyeva.
atk-s0508a12:550_3: Tāya ca gāthāya therena attano visesādhigamassa kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:550_4: Idha pana adhigatavisesassa attano āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca nandiyena saha samaggavāso dassitoti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:550_5: Samaggavāsaṁ pana vasantā te yathā ca vasiṁsu,
atk-s0508a12:556_0: Ramanti dhammaratiyā, hitvāna lokiyaṁ rati’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:557_0: Tattha pācīnavaṁsadāyamhīti pācīnavaṁsanāmake rakkhitagopite sahaparicchede vane.
atk-s0508a12:557_1: Tañhi vanaṁ gāmassa pācīnadisāyaṁ ṭhitattā vaṁsagumbaparikkhittattā ca ‘‘pācīnavaṁsadāyo’’ti vutto,
atk-s0508a12:557_5: Pahāyānappake bhogeti uḷārena puññānubhāvena adhigate kulaparamparāgate ca mahante bhogakkhandhe chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0508a12:557_7: Uñche pattāgate ratāti uñchācariyāya ābhatattā uñche patte āgatattā pattāgate pattapariyāpanne ratā abhiratā,
atk-s0508a12:557_8: saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṁ paṭikkhipitvā jaṅghabalaṁ nissāya bhikkhācariyāya laddhena missakabhatteneva santuṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:558_0: Āraddhavīriyāti uttamatthassa adhigamāya āditova pageva sampāditavīriyā.
atk-s0508a12:558_1: Pahitattāti ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena kālena kālaṁ samāpajjanena ca nibbānaṁ patipesitacittā.
atk-s0508a12:558_2: Niccaṁ daḷhaparakkamāti vattapaṭipattīsu diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānuyogena sabbakālaṁ asithilaparakkamā.
atk-s0508a12:558_4: hitvāna lokiyaṁ ratinti loke viditatāya lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokiyaṁ rūpārammaṇādiratiṁ pahāya maggapaññāya
atk-s0508a12:558_5: pajahitvā lokuttaradhammaratiyā aggaphalanibbānābhiratiyā ca ramanti abhiramantīti.
atk-s0508a12:561_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:561_3: santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ indriyesu guttadvārānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a12:561_4: taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthento bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjāsakkārabahulaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā,

atk-s0508a12:561_6: saṁsaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle vinatāya nāma nadiyā mahanto kacchapo hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ

atk-s0508a12:561_10: Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṁ vadanto bhāviniṁ sampattiṁ kathetvā pakkāmi.

atk-s0508a12:597_2: Maṇḍananti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi ceva mālāgandhādīhi ca attabhāvassa alaṅkaraṇaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:597_9: Kāmarāgenāti vatthukāmesu chandarāgena aṭṭito pīḷito vibādhito āsinti yojanā.
atk-s0508a12:598_0: Upāyakusalenāti vineyyānaṁ damanūpāyacchekena kovidena buddhena bhagavatā hetubhūtena.
atk-s0508a12:598_2: Paluṭṭhamakkaṭīdevaccharādassanena hi upakkitavādacodanāya attano kāmarāgāpanayanaṁ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0508a12:598_3: Bhagavā hi āyasmantaṁ nandattheraṁ paṭhamaṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ upādāya ‘‘yathāyaṁ makkaṭī,
atk-s0508a12:598_4: evaṁ kakuṭapādiniyo upādāya janapadakalyāṇī’’ti mahatiyā āṇiyā khuddakaṁ āṇiṁ nīharanto chaḍḍako viya,

atk-s0508a12:598_6: janapadakalyāṇiyaṁ virattacittaṁ kāretvā puna upakkitavādena kakuṭapādinīsupi cittaṁ virājetvā sammadeva
atk-s0508a12:598_10: Upāyena ñāyena sammadeva samathavipassanāya visuddhipaṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā bhave saṁsārapaṅke nimuggañca me cittaṁ ariyamaggena hatthena uttāriṁ,
atk-s0508a12:599_0: Imaṁ udānaṁ udānetvā thero punadivase bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – ‘‘yaṁ me, bhante,
atk-s0508a12:599_1: bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:599_8: Athassa bhagavā savisesaṁ indriyesu guttadvārataṁ ñatvā taṁ guṇaṁ vibhāvento,
atk-s0508a12:599_11: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ indriyesu guttadvārānaṁ yadidaṁ nando’’ti (a. ni. 1.219,
atk-s0508a12:599_13: Thero hi ‘‘yamevāhaṁ indriyānaṁ asaṁvaraṁ nissāya imaṁ vippakāraṁ patto,
atk-s0508a12:599_14: tamevāhaṁ suṭṭhu niggahessāmī’’ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṁvare ukkaṁsapāramiṁ agamāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:602_0: Pare ca naṁ pasaṁsantīti āyasmato sirimattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:602_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato pāramiyo
atk-s0508a12:602_3: pūretvā tusitabhavane ṭhitakāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:602_4: sakkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo nekkhammajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a12:602_5: kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā caturāsītisahassaparimāṇena tāpasagaṇena parivuto himavantappadese
atk-s0508a12:602_6: devatābhinimmite assame jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā vasanto purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya lakkhaṇamantesu
atk-s0508a12:602_7: āgataniyāmena ca buddhaguṇe anussaritvā atīte buddhe uddissa aññatarasmiṁ nadīnivattane pulinacetiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:602_11: So tesaṁ lakkhaṇamante āharitvā tattha āgatāni mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni vibhajitvā tadanusārena attano bale ṭhatvā buddhaguṇe kittesi.
atk-s0508a12:602_12: Taṁ sutvā tepi tāpasā pasannamānasā tato paṭṭhāya sammāsambuddhaṁ uddissa thūpapūjaṁ karontā viharanti.
atk-s0508a12:603_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṁ okkanto hoti.
