atk-s0508a12:814_0: Tattha satimāti sayaṁ samudāgamanasampannāya satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā sativepullappattiyā ca satimā.
atk-s0508a12:814_4: Saddhādīnañhettha balaggahaṇena gahaṇaṁ satipi satiādīnaṁ balabhāve,
atk-s0508a12:815_0: Idāni yāya paṭipattiyā attano satimantādibhāvo sātisayaṁ pubbenivāsañāṇañca siddhaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:815_2: Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhāneti kāyānupassanādike attano visayabhedena catubbidhe lokiyalokuttaramissake satisaṅkhāte satipaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0508a12:815_5: Satipaṭṭhānesu hi suppatiṭṭhitacittassa satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gatā eva honti,
atk-s0508a12:815_8: ‘‘catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvetvā’’tiādīhi (dī. ni.
atk-s0508a12:815_9: 3.143) sattakoṭṭhāsikesu sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammesu ekasmiṁ koṭṭhāse bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchante itare agacchantā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0508a12:818_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:818_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato asītikoṭivibhavaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:818_4: pabbatapāde araññāyatane ekissā nadiyā tīre assamaṁ kāretvā viharanto attano anuggaṇhanatthaṁ upagataṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_5: satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso ajinacammaṁ pattharitvā adāsi .
atk-s0508a12:818_6: Tattha nisinnaṁ bhagavantaṁ pupphehi ca candanena ca pūjetvā ambaphalāni datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0508a12:818_7: Tassa bhagavā nisinnāsanasampattiṁ pakāsento anumodanaṁ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a12:818_8: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:818_9: ‘‘kaṇhamitto’’ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mahākaccānattherassa
atk-s0508a12:818_11: So mandapañño dandhaparakkamo ca hutvā ciraṁ kālaṁ viññuṁ sabrahmacāriṁ nissāyeva vasati.
atk-s0508a12:818_12: Bhikkhū ‘‘yathā nāma valli rukkhādīsu kiñci anissāya vaḍḍhituṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0508a12:818_13: evamayampi kañci paṇḍitaṁ anissāya vaḍḍhituṁ na sakkotī’’ti valliyotveva samudācariṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:818_14: Aparabhāge pana veṇudattattheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sato sampajāno hutvā viharanto ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a12:824_0: Ahaṁ monena monissaṁ, gaṅgāsotova sāgara’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:825_0: Tattha yaṁ kiccaṁ daḷhavīriyenāti daḷhena vīriyena thirena parakkamena,
atk-s0508a12:825_1: daḷhavīriyena vā purisadhorayhena yaṁ kiccaṁ kātabbaṁ paṭipajjitabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:825_2: Yaṁ kiccaṁ boddhumicchatāti cattāri ariyasaccāni nibbānameva vā boddhuṁ bujjhituṁ icchantena paṭivijjhitukāmena yaṁ kiccaṁ karaṇīyaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:825_3: Karissaṁ nāvarajjhissanti tamahaṁ dāni karissaṁ na virādhessaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:825_5: Passa vīriyaṁ parakkamanti yathā paṭipajjamāne dhamme vidhinā īraṇato ‘‘vīriyaṁ’’,
atk-s0508a12:825_6: paraṁ paraṁ ṭhānaṁ akkamanato ‘‘parakkamo’’ti ca laddhanāmaṁ sammāvāyāmaṁ passa na saddhamevāti attano kattukāmataṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:826_8: Gaṅgāsotova sāgaranti yathā gaṅgāya soto sāgaraṁ samuddaṁ avirajjhanto ekaṁsato ogāhati,
atk-s0508a12:826_9: evaṁ ‘‘ahaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto maggañāṇena nibbānaṁ adhigamissāmi,
atk-s0508a12:826_10: tasmā taṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ me ācikkhathā’’ti theraṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ yāci.
atk-s0508a12:827_0: Taṁ sutvā veṇudattatthero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:827_1: Sopi kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:836_0: ‘‘Ko vā tvaṁ kassa vā putto, mahābrahmā idhāgato;
atk-s0508a12:837_0: Virocesi disā sabbā, udayaṁ sūriyo yathā.
atk-s0508a12:839_0: Ko vā tvaṁ kassa vā putto, kathaṁ jānemu taṁ mayaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:841_0: Namhi devā na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado.
atk-s0508a12:842_0: ‘‘Brahmabhāvo ca me natthi, etesaṁ uttamo ahaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:857_0: Mama kammaṁ pakittesi, hāsayanto mamaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:875_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:887_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto thero imāyeva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:890_0: Kese me olikhissantītiādikā āyasmato vītasokattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:890_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a12:890_3: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:890_4: mahatā isigaṇena parivuto araññe vasanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho ‘‘udumbarapupphasadisā dullabhadassanā
atk-s0508a12:890_6: idāneva upagantabbā’’ti mahatiyā parisāya saddhiṁ satthāraṁ daṭṭhuṁ gacchanto diyaḍḍhayojane sese byādhiko
atk-s0508a12:890_7: hutvā buddhagatāya saññāya kālaṅkato devesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:890_8: aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṁ dvinnaṁ vassasatānaṁ matthake dhammāsokarañño kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:890_10: So vayappatto khattiyakumārehi sikkhitabbavijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato giridattattheraṁ nissāya gihibhūto
atk-s0508a12:890_11: suttantapiṭake abhidhammapiṭake ca visārado hutvā ekadivasaṁ massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato ādāsaṁ
atk-s0508a12:890_12: gahetvā kāyaṁ olokento valitapalitādīni disvā sañjātasaṁvego vipassanāya cittaṁ otāretvā bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā
atk-s0508a12:890_13: tasmiṁyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā giridattattherassa santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:897_0: ‘‘Mama aññataro sisso, sissānaṁ so kathesi me;
atk-s0508a12:898_0: Sutvāna te etamatthaṁ, ārocesuṁ mamaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:900_0: Tassānuvattati jano, lābho amhaṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a12:909_0: ‘‘Buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhuṁ lacchāma no bhavaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:928_0: Sabbe coḷā samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:929_1: kappako upasaṅkamīti gihikāle massukammasamaye ‘‘mama kese olikhissaṁ kappemī’’ti kesādīnaṁ chedanādivasena kappanato kappako nhāpito maṁ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a12:929_3: Sarīraṁ paccavekkhisanti sabbakāyike ādāse palitavalitamukhanimittādidassanamukhena ‘‘abhibhūto vata
atk-s0508a12:929_4: jarāya me kāyo’’ti jarābhibhūtaṁ attano sarīraṁ paccavekkhiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:929_5: Evaṁ paccavekkhato ca tuccho kāyo adissittha niccadhuvasukhasabhāvādīhi ritto hutvā me kāyo adissatha paññāyi. Kasmā?
atk-s0508a12:929_6: Andhakāre tamo byagā yena ayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena tamasā attano kāye andhagatā vijjamānampi asubhādisabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:929_8: tasmiṁ andhakāre andhakaraṇaṭṭhāne kāye yonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena ñāṇālokena avijjātamo vigato,
atk-s0508a12:929_9: tato eva sabbe coḷā samucchinnā corā viya kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato,
atk-s0508a12:929_10: sādhūhi alātabbato asaṅgahetabbato saṅkārakūṭādīsu chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍaṁ viya issarajanena ariyajanena
atk-s0508a12:929_11: jigucchitabbatāya coḷā viyāti vā ‘‘coḷā’’ti laddhanāmā kilesā samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a12:929_12: Aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā eva ca nesaṁ natthi dāni punabbhavo āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti natthīti.
atk-s0508a12:932_0: Pañca nīvaraṇe hitvātiādikā āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:932_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:932_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthari araññe viharante paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ dumasākhāya laggetvā
atk-s0508a12:932_4: gandhakuṭiṁ paviṭṭhe dhanuhattho gahanaṁ paviṭṭho satthu paṁsukūlaṁ disvā pasannamānaso dhanuṁ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0508a12:932_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ kuṭumbiyakule nibbatti.
atk-s0508a12:932_7: Tassa kira jātadivase tasmiṁ gehe sabbabhājanāni suvaṇṇaratanamayehi māsehi paripuṇṇāneva ahesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:932_9: So vayappatto dārapariggahaṁ katvā ekasmiṁ putte uppanne gharāvāsaṁ pahāya pabbajitvā gāmakāvāse vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:938_0: Cāpaṁ tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvāna añjaliṁ.
atk-s0508a12:944_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sāvatthiṁ upagantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā susāne vasati,
atk-s0508a12:944_1: tassa ca acirāgatasseva sato putto kālamakāsi.
atk-s0508a12:944_3: ‘‘mā idaṁ aputtakaṁ sāpateyyaṁ rājāno hareyyu’’nti taṁ uppabbājetukāmā mahatā parivārena therassa santikaṁ
atk-s0508a12:944_5: Thero attano vītarāgabhāvajānāpanatthaṁ ākāse ṭhatvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena tassā dhammaṁ desento –
atk-s0508a12:950_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, tuccho kāyo adissathā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:952_0: Tattha pañca nīvaraṇe hitvāti kāmacchandādike pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya jhānādhigamena viddhaṁsetvā.
atk-s0508a12:952_1: Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti kāmayogādīhi catūhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa nibbānassa adhigamāya.
atk-s0508a12:952_3: Yathā hi ādāso olokentassa rūpakāye guṇāguṇaṁ ādaṁseti,
atk-s0508a12:952_4: evaṁ vipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammānaṁ sāmaññavisesāvabodhanato ñāṇadassanabhūto dhammādāso vipassantassa vodānasaṁkilesadhammavibhāvanena
atk-s0508a12:952_5: tappahānasādhanena ca visesato nāmakāye guṇaṁ ādaṁseti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a12:955_0: Imaṁ kāyaṁ dhammasamūhaṁ mama attabhāvaṁ ajjhattikabāhirāyatanabhāvato santarabāhiraṁ sabbaṁ anavasesaṁ
atk-s0508a12:955_2: Evaṁ passatā ca mayā ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti attano santāne parasantāne ca tuccho kāyo adissatha niccasārādivirahito
atk-s0508a12:955_3: tuccho khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto attabhāvakāyo ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato apassittha.
atk-s0508a12:955_6: bālassa taṇhāsaṁyuttassa evamayaṁ kāyo samudāgato’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0508a12:955_10: na dānissa kiñci mayā passitabbaṁ atthīti katakiccataṁ dassento aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:955_11: Evaṁ thero imāhi gāthāhi purāṇadutiyikāya dhammaṁ desetvā taṁ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca sampatiṭṭhāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0508a12:958_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle paccantadese
atk-s0508a12:958_3: uppajjitvā viññutaṁ patto vanacāriko hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a12:958_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde campāyaṁ gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:958_9: Te ubhopi viññutaṁ patvā āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ koḷivisaṁ pabbajitaṁ sutvā ‘‘soṇopi nāma tathāsukhumālo pabbaji,
atk-s0508a12:958_11: Tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:958_12: Nandako pana kilesānaṁ balavabhāvena tāva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetuṁ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0508a12:958_14: Athassa bharatatthero āsayaṁ ñatvā avassayo bhavitukāmo taṁ pacchāsamaṇaṁ katvā vihārato nikkhamitvā maggasamīpe nisinno vipassanākathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0508a12:959_0: Tena ca samayena sakaṭasatthe gacchante eko sakaṭe yutto goṇo cikkhallaṭṭhāne sakaṭaṁ uddharituṁ asakkonto paripati.
atk-s0508a12:959_1: Tato naṁ satthavāho sakaṭā mocetvā tiṇañca pānīyañca datvā parissamaṁ apanetvā puna dhure yojesi.
atk-s0508a12:959_2: Tato goṇo vūpasantaparissamo laddhabalo taṁ sakaṭaṁ cikkhallaṭṭhānato uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0508a12:959_5: imassa kamma’’nti taṁ nidassetvā tena ‘‘passāmī’’ti vutte ‘‘imamatthaṁ suṭṭhu upadhārehī’’ti āha.
atk-s0508a12:959_6: Itaro ‘‘yathāyaṁ goṇo vūpasantaparissamo paṅkaṭṭhānato bhāraṁ ubbahati,
atk-s0508a12:959_7: evaṁ mayāpi saṁsārapaṅkato attā uddharitabbo’’ti tamevārammaṇaṁ katvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:967_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano jeṭṭhabhātikassa bharatattherassa santike aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:970_0: Bhiyyo laddhāna saṁvegaṁ, adīno vahate dhuraṁ.
atk-s0508a12:973_0: Ājānīyaṁ maṁ dhāretha, puttaṁ buddhassa orasa’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:974_1: adīno vahate dhuranti ‘‘mayhaṁ jātibalavīriyānaṁ ananucchavikametaṁ yadidaṁ āgatassa bhārassa avahana’’nti
atk-s0508a12:974_5: Bhiyyo punappunaṁ bhiyyosomattāya attano dhuraṁ bhāraṁ vahate ubbahati.
atk-s0508a12:977_3: Ayaṁ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ manuññadassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:977_4: mudusukhasamphassaṁ upāhanadvayaṁ gahetvā gacchanto satthāraṁ caṅkamantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanā
atk-s0508a12:977_7: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti āha.
atk-s0508a12:977_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde campānagare gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:977_11: So viññutaṁ patto soṇattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘sopi nāma pabbajī’’ti sañjātasaṁvego pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:977_12: katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:985_0: Ito phalaṁ labhissāmi, so me attho samijjhatu.
atk-s0508a12:988_0: ‘‘Yo pānadhiṁ me adāsi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a12:997_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:1007_0: Datvāna pānadhiṁ ekaṁ, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1011_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikena nandakattherena heṭṭhā vuttanayena aññābyākaraṇe kate ‘‘idāni nandakopi arahā jāto,
atk-s0508a12:1011_1: handa mayaṁ ubhopi satthu santikaṁ gantvā vusitabrahmacariyataṁ nivedessāmāti uppannaṁ parivitakkaṁ nandakattherassa kathento –
atk-s0508a12:1017_0: So no attho anuppatto, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1018_2: Gacchāmāti tena attanā ca ekajjhaṁ kātabbakiriyāvacanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1018_4: sammāsambuddho hi samantacakkhunā buddhacakkhunā ca sattānaṁ āsayānusayacaritādīnaṁ yathābhūtavilokanena
atk-s0508a12:1018_5: sadevakassa lokassa vajjāvajjaṁ upanijjhāyatīti visesato upajjhāyoti vattabbataṁ arahati.
atk-s0508a12:1018_9: Yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāratāya abhītanādabhāvato sīhanādaṁ buddhassa sammāsambuddhassa tato eva sabbasattuttamatāya seṭṭhassa,
atk-s0508a12:1018_10: buddhānaṁ vā sāvakabuddhādīnaṁ seṭṭhassa sammukhā purato nadissāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1019_5: Anukampāyāti anuggaṇhanena amhe dvepi pabbājayi pabbājesi.
atk-s0508a12:1019_7: So no attho anuppattoti so attho sabbesaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ arahattaphalaṁ no amhehi anuppatto,
atk-s0508a12:1022_0: Nadanti evaṁ sappaññāti āyasmato bhāradvājattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:1022_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1022_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sumanaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1022_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gottanāmena bhāradvājotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a12:1022_6: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṁ vasanto ekaputtaṁ labhi.
atk-s0508a12:1022_9: asukassa nāma ācariyassa santike sippaṁ sikkhitvā ehī’’ti taṁ takkasilaṁ pesesi.
atk-s0508a12:1022_10: So gacchanto antarāmagge satthu sāvakaṁ aññataraṁ mahātheraṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ labhitvā tassa santike dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1022_11: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1025_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1028_0: Athassa pitā bhāradvājo veḷuvane viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1028_1: Atha putto satthāraṁ vandituṁ rājagahaṁ āgato satthu santike nisinnaṁ pitaraṁ disvā tuṭṭhacitto ‘‘pitāpi kho me pabbajito,
atk-s0508a12:1028_2: kiṁ nu kho tena pabbajjākiccaṁ matthakaṁ pāpita’’nti vīmaṁsanto khīṇāsavabhāvaṁ ñatvā taṁ sīhanādaṁ nadāpetukāmo, ‘‘sādhu,
atk-s0508a12:1033_0: ‘‘Satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito;
atk-s0508a12:1034_0: Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṁ disvā anāsava’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1035_0: Tattha nadantīti yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāravasena abhītanādaṁ nadanti gajjanti.
atk-s0508a12:1035_4: tato eva anavasesasaṁkilesapakkhanimmathanena savāhanaṁ kilesamāraṁ abhisaṅkhāramāraṁ devaputtamārañca
atk-s0508a12:1035_5: jetvā sabbaso vijitasaṅgāmā nadanti sappaññāti sambandho.
atk-s0508a12:1036_0: Evaṁ vijetabbavijayena sīhanādaṁ dassetvā idāni ārādhetabbasamārādhanena icchitabbasiddhiyā ca taṁ dassetuṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1036_2: Tattha satthā ca pariciṇṇo meti mama satthā sammāsambuddho yathānusiṭṭhaṁ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena mayā pariciṇṇo upāsito,
atk-s0508a12:1036_4: Dhammo saṅgho ca pūjitoti navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo,
atk-s0508a12:1036_5: yathāpaṭipattiyāgatamaggānuppattiyā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagamanena ariyasaṅgho ca mayā pūjito mānito.
atk-s0508a12:1036_7: puttaṁ disvā anāsavanti mama puttaṁ anāsavaṁ sabbaso khīṇāsavaṁ disvā dassanahetu ahampi vitto nirāmisāya pītiyā tuṭṭho,
atk-s0508a12:1036_8: tatoyeva nirāmisena somanassena sumano jātoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1039_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1039_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sobhitaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ disvā pasannacitto punnāgapupphehi
atk-s0508a12:1039_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā kaṇhadinnoti
atk-s0508a12:1039_6: laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno dhammasenāpatiṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:1050_0: ‘‘Bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:1051_0: Na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1053_4: Na hi patirūpadesavāsena vinā sappurisūpanissayo sambhavati.
atk-s0508a12:1053_6: Etena attano bāhusaccaṁ dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:1053_10: añjasaṁ amatogadhanti te dhamme sutvā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇādito pariggahetvā anukkamena
atk-s0508a12:1053_11: vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā amatogadhaṁ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṁ taṁsampāpakaṁ añjasaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ paṭipajjiṁ pāpuṇiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1054_0: Bhavarāgahatassame satoti bhavarāgena bhavataṇhāya anādimati saṁsāre hatassa upaddutassa mama sato samānassa,
atk-s0508a12:1054_2: Bhavarāgo puna me na vijjatīti tato eva puna idāni bhavarāgo me natthi.
atk-s0508a12:1054_4: na ca me etarahi vijjatīti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakāle sekkhakāle ca me bhavarāgo ahosi,
atk-s0508a12:1054_5: aggamaggappattito pana paṭṭhāya na cāhu na ca ahosi,
atk-s0508a12:1054_7: etarahi adhunāpi na ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati,
atk-s0508a12:1054_9: Bhavarāgavacaneneva cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya mānādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanataṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:1059_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:1059_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto kusaṭṭhakaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1059_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1059_5: gahetvā migasiranakkhattena jātattā migasiroti laddhanāmo vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1059_7: yaṁ parijappetvā tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṁ nakhena ākoṭetvā ‘‘ayaṁ satto asukaṭṭhāne nibbatto’’ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a12:1060_0: So gharāvāsaṁ anicchanto paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā taṁ vijjaṁ nissāya lokena sakkato garukato lābhī
atk-s0508a12:1060_1: hutvā vicaranto sāvatthiṁ upagato satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano ānubhāvaṁ pakāsento – ‘‘ahaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1060_5: ‘‘chavasīsāni āharāpetvā mantaṁ parijappetvā nakhena sīsaṁ ākoṭento nirayādikaṁ tehi tehi nibbattaṭṭhānaṁ jānāmī’’ti kathesi.
atk-s0508a12:1060_6: Athassa bhagavā parinibbutassa bhikkhuno sīsakapālaṁ āharāpetvā,
atk-s0508a12:1060_9: So taṁ kapālaṁ mantaṁ parijappetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā neva antaṁ na koṭiṁ passati.
atk-s0508a12:1060_12: ‘‘upaparikkhissāmi tāvā’’ti vatvā punappunaṁ parivattentopi na passateva.
atk-s0508a12:1060_13: Bāhirakamantena hi khīṇāsavassa gatiṁ kathaṁ jānissati,
atk-s0508a12:1060_14: athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci.
atk-s0508a12:1060_20: ito uttaritarampi jānāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘nibbānaṁ gato so’’ti āha.
atk-s0508a12:1060_22: ‘‘Tena hi pabbajā’’ti vatvā taṁ pabbājetvā paṭhamaṁ samathakammaṭṭhāne niyojetvā jhānābhiññāsu patiṭṭhitassa vipassanāya kammaṁ upadisi.
atk-s0508a12:1060_23: So vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1072_0: Akuppā me vimuttīti, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayā’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1073_1: sammāsambuddhasāsaneti yato pabhuti ahaṁ pabbajito buddhassa bhagavato sāsane,
atk-s0508a12:1073_3: Vimuccamāno uggacchinti saṁkilesapakkhato paṭhamaṁ tāva samathavipassanāhi vimuccamāno vodānadhammasavanena uṭṭhahiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1073_4: Evaṁ uggacchanto kāmadhātuṁ upaccagaṁ anāgāmimaggena accantameva kāmadhātuṁ atikkamiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1074_1: tato cittaṁ vimucci meti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhūtattā seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahākaruṇāyogena
atk-s0508a12:1074_2: ‘‘ayaṁ kulaputto mama sāsane pabbajitvā kathaṁ nu kho paṭipajjatī’’ti pekkhantassa tato anāgāmimaggādhigamato
atk-s0508a12:1074_3: pacchā aggamaggādhigamena mama cittaṁ sabbasaṁkilesato accantameva mucci.
atk-s0508a12:1074_5: sabbasaṁyojanakkhayāti tathāvimuttacittattā eva sabbesaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ khayā parikkhayā iti evaṁ akuppā me vimuttīti aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1077_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1077_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ passitvā pasannamānaso pattaṁ ādāya
atk-s0508a12:1077_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:1077_7: So vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1077_8: vicaranto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a12:1079_0: Rittakaṁ pattaṁ disvāna, kummāsaṁ pūrayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1089_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā ca vidālitā;
atk-s0508a12:1090_0: Vimariyādikataṁ cittaṁ, idheva vidhamissatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1091_1: tattha tattha punappunanti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ bhave punappunaṁ nibbattamānāni gahakāni attabhāvagehāni na nibbāni anavaṭṭhitāni ittarāni parittakālāni.
atk-s0508a12:1091_2: Gahakāraṁ gavesantoti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṁ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṁ pariyesanto ettakaṁ kālaṁ anuvicarinti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a12:1091_3: Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṁ gahakārakagavesanassa kāraṇavacanaṁ .
atk-s0508a12:1091_4: Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṁ upagantuṁ dukkhā,
atk-s0508a12:1091_5: na ca sā tasmiṁ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
atk-s0508a12:1092_0: Gahakārakadiṭṭhosīti idāni pana yena so sakkā daṭṭhuṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1092_2: Puna gehanti puna imasmiṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṁ mama gehaṁ na kāhasi na karissasi.
atk-s0508a12:1092_3: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
atk-s0508a12:1092_4: Thūṇikā ca vidālitāti idāni tayā kātabbassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātā kaṇṇikā ca bhinnā.
atk-s0508a12:1092_5: Vimariyādikataṁ cittanti mama cittaṁ vigatantaṁ kataṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1092_7: Tato eva idheva vidhamissati imasmiṁyeva bhave viddhaṁsissati,
atk-s0508a12:1095_2: Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0508a12:1095_3: tassa dhātuṁ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷakumbhaṇḍayakkhagandhabbehi sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe
atk-s0508a12:1095_4: kate tattha sudhotaṁ attano uttarāsaṅgaṁ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṁ katvā pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1095_5: Taṁ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṁ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse
atk-s0508a12:1095_7: So taṁ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1095_8: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1095_9: upavāṇoti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1095_10: vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto arahattaṁ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1115_0: Manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṁ akaṁsu te.
atk-s0508a12:1123_0: Manussā devanāgā ca, buddhapūjaṁ akaṁsu te.
atk-s0508a12:1126_0: ‘‘Sabbaṁ maṇimayaṁ thūpaṁ, akaruṁ te ca kañcukaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:1131_0: Manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a12:1133_0: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a12:1139_0: Manussā devanāgā ca, garuḷā ca kumbhaṇḍakā.
atk-s0508a12:1141_0: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a12:1147_0: Manujā devatā nāgā, kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a12:1150_0: ‘‘Vediyo satta katvāna, dhajaṁ chattaṁ akaṁsu te;
atk-s0508a12:1153_0: Rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hoti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a12:1156_0: ‘‘Tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṁ pūjenti mānusā;
atk-s0508a12:1157_0: Na te thūpaṁ āruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te.
atk-s0508a12:1159_0: Dhajaṁ vā pupphadāmaṁ vā, abhiropeti uttariṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1160_0: ‘‘Na te passanti taṁ yakkhaṁ, dāmaṁ passanti gacchato;
atk-s0508a12:1161_0: Evaṁ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1162_0: ‘‘Viruddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane;
atk-s0508a12:1165_0: Āmoditaṁ janaṁ disvā, evaṁ cintesahaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:1167_0: Imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṁ kubbaṁ na tappare.
atk-s0508a12:1173_0: Vāteritaṁ dhajaṁ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṁ janesahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1175_0: Taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā, vipākaṁ pucchahaṁ dhaje.
atk-s0508a12:1191_0: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:1198_0: ‘‘Satasahasse kataṁ kammaṁ, phalaṁ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a12:1201_0: Tīṇi yojanāni sāmantā, ussīyanti dhajā sadā.
atk-s0508a12:1205_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho uppajji.
atk-s0508a12:1205_2: Therassa ca gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṁ paṭivasati.
atk-s0508a12:1205_4: Athāyasmā upavāṇo nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṁ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a12:1205_5: Brāhmaṇo ‘‘kenaci aññena payojanena thero āgato’’ti ñatvā,
atk-s0508a12:1208_0: Sace uṇhodakaṁ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0508a12:1211_0: Apacitopaceyyānaṁ, tassa icchāmi hātave’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1212_1: yo imasmiṁ loke pūjaneyyānaṁ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi ca brahmehi pūjito,
atk-s0508a12:1212_5: sobhanagamanādinā sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṁ satthā devadevo sakkānaṁ atisakko brahmānaṁ atibrahmā,
atk-s0508a12:1212_6: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṁ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a12:1212_8: tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṁ taṁ hātave upanetuṁ icchāmīti.
atk-s0508a12:1212_9: Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇo uṇhodakaṁ tadanurūpaṁ vātārahañca bhesajjaṁ bhagavato upanāmesi.
atk-s0508a12:1215_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1215_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bījaniṁ gahetvā bodhiyā pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1215_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1215_5: isidinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu candanamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe pāṭihāriyaṁ disvā pasannamānaso satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1215_6: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
atk-s0508a12:1217_0: ‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā;
atk-s0508a12:1218_0: Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā.
atk-s0508a12:1220_0: ‘‘Addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṁ, kāmā aniccā iti cāpi āhu;
atk-s0508a12:1221_0: Rāgañca tesaṁ na balatthi chettuṁ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṁ dhanañcā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1223_1: kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānāti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharā upāsakā mayā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0508a12:1223_2: pariyattidhammadharattā eva ‘‘kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’’ti kāmesu ādīnavapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ bhāsamānā,
atk-s0508a12:1223_4: puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhāti sārattā hutvā bahalarāgarattā maṇīsu kuṇḍalesu ca,
atk-s0508a12:1223_7: aññaṁ bhaṇantā aññaṁ karontā diṭṭhā mayāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1224_0: Yatoti yasmā te upāsakā sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca apekkhavanto,
atk-s0508a12:1224_1: tasmā idha imasmiṁ buddhasāsane dhammaṁ yāthāvato addhā ekaṁsena na jānanti.
atk-s0508a12:1224_2: Evaṁ bhūtā ca ‘‘kāmā aniccā’’iti cāpi āhu ahosi,
atk-s0508a12:1224_4: Rāgañca tesaṁ na balatthi chettunti tesaṁ upāsakānaṁ yasmā rāgaṁ chettuṁ samucchindituṁ tādisaṁ ñāṇabalaṁ natthi,
atk-s0508a12:1224_5: tasmā tena kāraṇena sitā taṇhāvasena nissitā puttadāraṁ dhanañca allīnā na vissajjentīti sabbametaṁ devatā
atk-s0508a12:1224_7: Taṁ sutvā upāsako saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1230_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto imā eva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:1233_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1233_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sataraṁsiṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā piṇḍāya carantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1233_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1234_0: So vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā himavantasamīpe bheravāya nāma
atk-s0508a12:1234_2: Athekadivasaṁ mahā akālamegho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo thanento gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārento gaḷagaḷāyanto uṭṭhahitvā vassituṁ ārabhi,
atk-s0508a12:1234_4: Taṁ saddaṁ sutvā acchataracchuvanamahiṁsahatthiādayo bhītatasitā bhītaravaṁ viraviṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:1234_5: Thero pana āraddhavipassanattā kāye jīvite ca nirapekkho vigatalomahaṁso taṁ acintento vipassanāyameva
atk-s0508a12:1234_6: kammaṁ karonto ghammāpagamena utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā saha abhiññāhi
atk-s0508a12:1242_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:1246_0: Tassa mayhaṁ ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
atk-s0508a12:1247_0: Natthi bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā.
atk-s0508a12:1249_0: ‘‘Dhammatā mamesā yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile;
atk-s0508a12:1250_0: Viharato natthi bhayaṁ vā, chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1252_1: devo ca gaḷagaḷāyatīti devo megho vassati ca,
atk-s0508a12:1252_4: Ekako cāhaṁ bherave bile viharāmīti ahañca ekako asahāyo sappaṭibhayāyaṁ pabbataguhāyaṁ vasāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1252_5: tassa mayhaṁ evaṁbhūtassa me sato natthi bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vāti cittutrāsasaññitaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1252_6: bhayaṁ vā taṁnimittakaṁ sarīrassa chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁsanamattaṁ vā natthi.
atk-s0508a12:1253_1: Apariññātavatthukassa hi tattha appahīnacchandarāgatāya bhayādinā bhavitabbaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1253_4: tasmā bhayādīnaṁ abhāvo dhammatā mamesā mama dhammasabhāvo esoti aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1256_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0508a12:1256_3: ārāmagopako hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ ākāsena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1256_5: Satthā taṁ anuggaṇhanto ākāseyeva ṭhatvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a12:1256_6: So taṁ datvā uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedi.
atk-s0508a12:1256_7: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1256_8: nitakoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1256_9: gahetvā araññe viharanto ghaṭento arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1270_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā there phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharante padhānapariggāhako thero taṁ āraññāyatanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1270_1: gantvā tattha vasantānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pariggaṇhanatthaṁ ‘‘kassa selūpama’’ntiādinā paṭhamaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:1271_2: ṭhitaṁ nānupakampatīti imasmiṁ araññāyatane vasantesu kassa bhikkhuno cittaṁ aggaphalādhigamena ekaghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1271_3: sabbesaṁ iñjanānaṁ abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyā ca ṭhitaṁ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānukampati na vedhati.
atk-s0508a12:1271_4: Idānissa akampanākāraṁ saddhiṁ kāraṇena dassetuṁ ‘‘viratta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1271_5: Tattha virattaṁ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1271_9: Na kuppatīti na dussati na vikāraṁ āpajjati.
atk-s0508a12:1271_10: Yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittanti yassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṁ mano evaṁ vuttanayena tādibhāvena bhāvitaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1271_11: kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti taṁ puggalaṁ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṁ upagamissati,
atk-s0508a12:1272_1: Evaṁ aniyamavasena pucchitamatthaṁ nitakatthero attūpanāyikaṁ katvā vissajjento ‘‘mama selūpamaṁ citta’’ntiādinā dutiyagāthāya aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1275_0: Na tāva supituṁ hotīti āyasmato soṇassa poṭiriyaputtassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:1275_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro sikhissa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1275_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ poṭiriyassa nāma gāmabhojakassa putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:1275_6: So vayappatto bhaddiyassa sākiyarañño senāpati ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1275_12: Taṁ bhagavā anupiyāyaṁ ambavane viharanto attano obhāsaṁ pharāpetvā tenassa satiṁ janetvā imāya gāthāya taṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:1281_0: Saṅgāme me mataṁ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1282_1: ratti nakkhattamālinīti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṁ navamaṁ khaṇaṁ labhitvā ṭhitassa viññujātikassa yāva na arahattaṁ hatthagataṁ hoti,
atk-s0508a12:1282_2: tāva ayaṁ nakkhattamālinī ratti supituṁ niddāyituṁ na hoti,
atk-s0508a12:1282_5: ratti hoti vijānatāti esā ratti nāma manussānaṁ migapakkhīnañca niddūpagamanena visesato nissaddavelābhūtā
atk-s0508a12:1282_6: paṭipattiṁ attani sañjaggituṁ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuñjitumeva vijānatā viññunā icchitā hotīti.
atk-s0508a12:1283_0: Taṁ sutvā soṇo saṁviggataramānaso hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā abbhokāsikaṅgaṁ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:1283_2: Tattha avapatitanti avamukhaṁ patitaṁ uddhaṁpādaṁ adhomukhaṁ patitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1283_3: Kuñjaro ce anukkameti kuñjaro anukkameyya ce.
atk-s0508a12:1283_5: yadāhaṁ hatthimāruhitvā saṅgāmaṁ paviṭṭho hatthikkhandhato patito,
atk-s0508a12:1283_6: tadāhaṁ saṅgāme tena hatthinā maddito mato ahosiṁ ce,
atk-s0508a12:1283_10: Imaṁ gāthaṁ vadantoyeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1288_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1294_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1294_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannacitto kapitthaphalamadāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1294_4: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1294_5: nisabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sākiyakoliyānaṁ saṅgāme buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1300_0: So arahattaṁ pana patvā attano sahāyabhikkhū pamādavihārena kālaṁ vītināmente disvā te ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:1305_1: bālaputhujjanassa piyāyitabbasabhāvatāya piyarūpe manuññasabhāvatāya manorame rūpādike pañca kāmaguṇe
atk-s0508a12:1305_2: kāmakoṭṭhāse hitvā pahāya pariccajitvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca vasena gharā gharabandhanato
atk-s0508a12:1305_3: nikkhamma nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṁ upagato viññujātiko pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0508a12:1305_5: Evaṁ te bhikkhū ovaditvā ‘‘ayaṁ pare eva saññāpento viharati,
atk-s0508a12:1305_6: ‘‘sayaṁ pana akārako’ti mā cintayitthā’’ti tesaṁ attano paṭipannabhāvaṁ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a12:1309_1: Tattha nābhinandāmi maraṇanti maraṇaṁ na abhikaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0508a12:1309_2: Nābhinandāmi jīvitanti idaṁ pana tassa kāraṇavacanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1309_5: Yo hi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇāya kilesābhisaṅkhāre ācinoti upacinoti,
atk-s0508a12:1309_6: so punabbhavābhinibbattiṁ abhinandanto nāntariyakatāya attano maraṇampi abhinandati nāma kāraṇassa appahīnattā,
atk-s0508a12:1309_7: khīṇāsavo pana sabbaso ācayagāmidhamme pahāya apacayagāmidhamme patiṭṭhito pariññātavatthuko sabbaso
atk-s0508a12:1309_8: jīvitaṁ anabhinandanto maraṇampi anabhinandati nāma kāraṇassa eva suppahīnattā. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a12:1309_12: yāva parinibbānā avaṭṭhānañca kathanti āha ‘‘kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1309_14: kilesaparinibbāne siddhe satipaññāvepullappattiyā sato sampajāno kevalaṁ khandhaparinibbānakālaṁ paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1309_16: na pana me maraṇe jīvite vā abhinandanā atthi arahattamaggeneva tassa samugghāṭitattāti.
atk-s0508a12:1312_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1312_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso kosambaphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1312_4: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ sākiyarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1312_5: usabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0508a12:1312_6: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṁ akatvā divā saṅgaṇikārāmo sakalarattiṁ niddāyamāno vītināmeti.
atk-s0508a12:1312_7: So ekadivasaṁ muṭṭhassati asampajāno niddaṁ okkanto supine kesamassuṁ ohāretvā ambapallavavaṇṇaṁ cīvaraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1312_8: pārupitvā hatthigīvāyaṁ nisīditvā nagaraṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṁ tattheva manusse sampatte disvā lajjāya hatthikkhandhato
atk-s0508a12:1312_10: ‘‘īdisaṁ nāma supinaṁ muṭṭhassatinā asampajānena niddāyamānena mayā diṭṭha’’nti uppannasaṁvego vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1315_0: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1318_0: Atha thero yathādiṭṭhaṁ supinaṁ aṅkusaṁ katvā arahattassa adhigatattā tasseva supinassa kittanavasena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:1324_0: Sohaṁ ditto tadā santo, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a12:1325_1: aṁse katvāna cīvaranti ambapallavākāraṁ pavāḷavaṇṇaṁ cīvaraṁ khandhe karitvā uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā.
atk-s0508a12:1325_2: Gāmanti attano rājadhāniṁ hatthikkhandhe nisinno piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1325_3: paviṭṭhamattova mahājanena olokiyamāno hatthikkhandhato oruyha ṭhito paṭibujjhiṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1325_4: pabuddhova saṁvegaṁ alabhiṁ tadā ‘‘muṭṭhassati asampajāno hutvā niddāyokkamanena etaṁ jāta’’nti.
atk-s0508a12:1325_5: Apare pana ‘‘rājāva hutvā rattibhāge evarūpaṁ supinaṁ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā hatthikkhandhaṁ āruyha
atk-s0508a12:1325_6: nagaravīthiyaṁ caranto taṁ supinaṁ saritvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha saṁvegaṁ labhitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1325_7: arahattaṁ patvā udānaṁ udānento imā gāthā abhāsī’’ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a12:1325_8: Dittoti tasmiṁ rājakāle jātimadabhogamadādiparidappito samāno saṁvegamalabhinti yojanā.
atk-s0508a12:1328_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1328_3: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1328_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ duggatakule nibbattitvā yāva vayappatti,
atk-s0508a12:1328_6: tāva aññaṁ upāyaṁ ajānanto kappaṭakhaṇḍanivāsano sarāvahattho tattha tattha kuraṁ pariyesanto vicari,
atk-s0508a12:1328_8: So vayappatto tiṇaṁ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṁ kappento ekadivasaṁ tiṇalāvanatthaṁ araññaṁ gato tattha aññataraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1328_9: khīṇāsavattheraṁ disvā taṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0508a12:1328_11: So dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho ‘‘kiṁ me imāya kicchajīvikāyā’’ti pabbajitvā attano nivatthakappaṭacoḷaṁ ekasmiṁ ṭhāne nikkhipi.
atk-s0508a12:1328_13: tadā taṁ kappaṭaṁ olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati,
atk-s0508a12:1328_16: Tassa taṁ kāraṇaṁ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1328_17: Athekadivasaṁ kappaṭakuro bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṁ parisapariyante nisinno niddāyati,
atk-s0508a12:1333_0: ‘‘Mā kho tvaṁ kappaṭa pacālesi, mā tvaṁ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:1334_0: Na hi tvaṁ kappaṭa mattamaññāsi, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1336_0: Tattha ayamiti kappaṭo kappaṭakuroti kappaṭakuro bhikkhu ‘‘ayaṁ mama kappaṭo,
atk-s0508a12:1336_1: imaṁ paridahitvā yathā tathā jīvāmī’’ti evaṁ uppannamicchāvitakko acchāya atibharitāya amataghaṭikāyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1336_2: mama amataghaṭe tahaṁ tahaṁ vassante ‘‘amatamadhigataṁ ahamanusāsāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1336_6: 2.341) ghosetvā mayā dhammāmate pavassiyamāne katapadaṁ jhānāni ocetuṁ lokiyalokuttarajjhānāni upacetuṁ
atk-s0508a12:1336_7: bhāvetuṁ katapadaṁ kaṭamaggavihitabhāvanāmaggaṁ idaṁ mama sāsanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1336_8: tathāpi dhammakaṭamatto mama sāsanadhammato ukkaṇṭhacitto apagatamānaso kappaṭakuroti taṁ codetvā punapissa
atk-s0508a12:1336_9: sahoḍḍhaṁ coraṁ gaṇhanto viya pamādavihāraṁ dassento ‘‘mā kho tvaṁ, kappaṭa,
atk-s0508a12:1337_3: ‘‘mama dhammaṁ suṇissāmī’’ti nisīditvā mā kho pacālesi mā pacalāhi mā niddaṁ upagacchi.
atk-s0508a12:1337_4: Mā tvaṁ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessanti taṁ niddāyamānaṁ upakaṇṇamhi kaṇṇasamīpe desanāhatthena ahaṁ mā patāḷessaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1337_5: Yathā ito paraṁ kilesappahānāya ahaṁ taṁ na ovadeyyaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1337_9: saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno mattaṁ pamāṇaṁ na vā maññasi,
atk-s0508a12:1337_11: so mā upajjhagā’’ti ettakampi na jānāsi,
atk-s0508a12:1337_12: passa yāva ca te aparaddhanti codesi.
atk-s0508a12:1338_0: Evaṁ bhagavatā dvīhi gāthāhi gāḷhaṁ taṁ niggayha codanāya katāya aṭṭhivedhaviddho viya caṇḍagajo maggaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1338_1: otaranto viya ca sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1346_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthārā vuttagāthādvayameva attano arahattādhigamanassa aṅkusabhūtanti paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1351_0: Ahobuddhā aho dhammāti āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:1351_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1351_5: So satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ cittakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_6: disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṁ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:1351_7: kāle samaṇadhammaṁ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi
atk-s0508a12:1351_9: Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṁ alabhamānā kulagharaṁ gatāpi
atk-s0508a12:1351_10: gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṁ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā.
atk-s0508a12:1351_11: Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṁ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṁ pucchiṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:1351_15: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṁ pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya vinicchinanto ‘‘pure laddho gabbho,
atk-s0508a12:1352_3: Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṁ netvā pabbājesi.

atk-s0508a12:1353_3: mukhaṁ dassetvā maggaphalappattiyā upāyaṁ karissāmī’’ti pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa

atk-s0508a12:1407_0: ‘‘Aho buddhā aho dhammā, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a12:1412_0: Jātimaraṇasaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1413_5: Aho no satthu sampadāti amhākaṁ satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo.
atk-s0508a12:1413_8: sāvako sacchikāhitīti etādisaṁ evarūpaṁ suvisuddhajjhānābhiññāparivāraṁ anavasesakilesakkhayāvahaṁ santaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1413_9: paṇītaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ sāvakopi nāma sacchikarissati,
atk-s0508a12:1413_10: tasmā evaṁvidhaguṇavisesādhigamahetubhūtā aho acchariyā buddhā bhagavanto,

atk-s0508a12:1414_0: Evaṁ sādhāraṇavasena dassitaṁ dhammassa sacchikiriyaṁ idāni attupanāyikaṁ katvā dassento ‘‘asaṅkheyyesū’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:1414_5: Tesamayaṁ pacchimako carimoyaṁ samussayoti yasmā ayaṁ sabbapacchimako,
atk-s0508a12:1414_7: tasmā jātimaraṇasahito khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito saṁsāro idāni āyatiṁ punabbhavābhāvato punabbhavo natthi,

atk-s0508a12:1417_3: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṁ upagato satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1417_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:1417_6: nibbattitvā dhammapāloti laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṁ gantvā sippaṁ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge
atk-s0508a12:1417_7: ekasmiṁ vihāre aññataraṁ theraṁ disvā tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1423_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṁ tasmiṁ vihāre dve sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni
atk-s0508a12:1423_1: ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1426_0: Jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1429_0: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti. – imā dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1430_7: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti yo bhikkhu daharova samāno taruṇo ‘‘tathāhaṁ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle jānissāmī’’ti acintetvā
atk-s0508a12:1430_8: buddhānaṁ sāsane appamādapaṭipattiyaṁ yuñjati samathavipassanābhāvanāya yogaṁ karoti,
atk-s0508a12:1430_9: so suttesu avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena jāgaro,
atk-s0508a12:1430_10: tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā amoghaṁ avañjhaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1430_12: tasmā saddhañca ‘‘atthi kammaṁ atthi kammavipāko’’tiādinayappavattaṁ kammaphalasaddhañca,

atk-s0508a12:1430_18: samannāgato bhikkhu buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ ovādaṁ anusiṭṭhiṁ anussaranto ādittampi attano sīsaṁ ajjhupekkhitvā
atk-s0508a12:1433_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto vipassissa

atk-s0508a12:1433_8: buddhasāsane pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:1439_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṁ padhānapariggāhakena therena
atk-s0508a12:1439_1: tasmiṁ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṁ padhānānuyogaṁ pariggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a12:1442_0: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino.

atk-s0508a12:1447_2: sārathinā sudantā assā viya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni samathaṁ dantabhāvaṁ nibbisevanabhāvaṁ gatāni.
atk-s0508a12:1447_3: Kassa navavidhampi mānaṁ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnampi āsavānaṁ abhāvena anāsavassa iṭṭhādīsu
atk-s0508a12:1447_4: tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādino devāpi pihayanti manussāpi sammāpaṭipattidassanādinā ca ādarena patthentīti.
atk-s0508a12:1448_0: Tattha ca gāthāyaṁ purimaḍḍhena anāgāmimaggādhigamo puṭṭho,
atk-s0508a12:1448_1: anāgāminopi hi indriyāni pahīnakāmarāgabyāpādatāya samathaṁ nibbisevanataṁ gatāni honti.
atk-s0508a12:1448_3: arahā hi ‘‘pahīnamāno anāsavo tādī’’ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a12:1449_0: Athāyasmā brahmāli padhānapariggāhakena vuttaṁ ‘‘kassindriyānī’’ti gāthaṁ paccanubhāsi.

atk-s0508a12:1452_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1452_3: satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ lūkhacīvaradharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a12:1452_4: taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṁ katvā tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:1452_5: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato brāhmaṇamāṇave vijjāsippāni sikkhāpento
atk-s0508a12:1452_6: ekadivasaṁ atthadassiṁ bhagavantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṁ gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0508a12:1452_7: vanditvā sirasi añjaliṁ katvā ‘‘yāvatā rūpino sattā’’tiādinā chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā bhājanaṁ pūretvā
atk-s0508a12:1453_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa nāma rañño amacco
atk-s0508a12:1453_1: hutvā tena satthu ānayanatthaṁ purisasahassena pesito satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:1453_2: pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṁ katvā tato cuto ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ sugatīsuyeva parivattento
atk-s0508a12:1453_3: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo bāvarībrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo
atk-s0508a12:1453_4: saṁvegajāto tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṁ satthu santikaṁ pesito
atk-s0508a12:1453_5: tesaṁ pannarasamo hutvā pañhe pucchitvā pañhavissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.

atk-s0508a12:1493_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthalūkhaṁ suttalūkhaṁ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṁ paṁsukūlaṁ dhāresi.
atk-s0508a12:1493_1: Tena naṁ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0508a12:1493_2: Aparabhāge purimakammappaccayā parihārassa akaraṇato therassa sarīre daddupīḷakādīni uppajjitvā vaḍḍhiṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:1493_3: So ‘‘senāsanaṁ dussatī’’ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palālasanthārāni attharitvā seti.
atk-s0508a12:1493_4: Taṁ ekadivasaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ satthā paṭisanthāravasena ‘‘chavipāpakā’’tiādinā paṭhamagāthāya pucchi.
atk-s0508a12:1494_1: Tattha chavipāpakāti daddukacchupīḷakāhi bhinnacchavibhāvato hīnacchavika duṭṭhacchavika .
atk-s0508a12:1494_2: Cittabhaddakāti anavasesakilesappahānena brahmavihārasevanāya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta.
atk-s0508a12:1494_4: Satataṁ samāhitoti aggaphalasamādhinā niccakālaṁ abhiṇhaṁ samāhitamānaso.
atk-s0508a12:1494_9: Bhikkhu tvaṁ sīti bhikkhu ko tvaṁ asi,
atk-s0508a12:1494_10: evaṁbhūto paresu tava senāsanaṁ katvā adentesu saṅghikañca senāsanaṁ apavisanto.
atk-s0508a12:1494_11: Kathaṁ karissasīti yathāvutte sītakāle kathaṁ attabhāvaṁ pavattesīti satthā pucchi.
atk-s0508a12:1494_12: Evaṁ pana puṭṭho thero satthu tamatthaṁ kathento –
atk-s0508a12:1498_3: tesaṁ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena ‘‘magadhā’’tveva bahuvacanena vuccati.
atk-s0508a12:1498_5: Iti me sutanti evaṁ mayā sutaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1498_8: Tena edise kāle magadhesu yattha katthaci mayā vasituṁ sakkāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:1498_10: yathaññe sukhajīvinoti yathā aññe sukhajīvino bhikkhū senāsanasappāyaṁ laddhā sundarehi attharaṇapāvuraṇehi sukhena sayanti,
atk-s0508a12:1498_11: evaṁ ahampi palālasanthārameva heṭṭhā santharitvā upari tiriyañca palālacchadaneneva chāditasarīratāya palālacchannako seyyaṁ sayiṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1501_0: Naukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pareti āyasmato visākhassa pañcālaputtassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:1501_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito cuddase
atk-s0508a12:1501_3: kappe paccantagāme daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ phalapariyesanaṁ carantehi tasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1501_4: gāme manussehi saddhiṁ araññaṁ gato tattha ekaṁ paccekabuddhaṁ disvā pasannamānaso valliphalaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1501_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1501_6: visākhoti laddhanāmo pañcālarājadhītuyā puttabhāvato pacchā pañcālaputtoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a12:1501_7: So pitari mate rajjaṁ kārento satthari attano gāmasamīpagate satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:1501_8: pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṁ sāvatthiṁ gato vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1509_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero ñātīnaṁ anukampāya jātibhūmiṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1509_1: Tattha manussā theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā kālena kālaṁ dhammaṁ suṇantā ekadivasaṁ ‘‘katihi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0508a12:1509_2: aṅgehi samannāgato dhammakathiko hotī’’ti dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṁ pucchiṁsu.
atk-s0508a12:1511_0: ‘‘Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe pāragataṁ na eraye;
atk-s0508a12:1512_0: Na cattavaṇṇaṁ parisāsu byāhare, anuddhato sammitabhāṇi subbato.
atk-s0508a12:1515_0: Saṁsevitabuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṁ na hi tena dullabha’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:1517_0: Tattha na ukkhipeti attānaṁ na ukkhipeyya,
atk-s0508a12:1517_1: jātiādīhi bāhusaccādīhi ca attukkaṁsanaṁ na kareyya.
atk-s0508a12:1517_2: No ca parikkhipe pareti pare parapuggale teheva jātiādīhi no parikkhipe paricchinditvā na khipeyya guṇaparidhaṁsanavasena vā na khipeyya.
atk-s0508a12:1517_4: Pare ojjhāpanavasena na okkhipe heṭṭhato katvā pare na olokāpeyya,
atk-s0508a12:1517_8: Pāragatanti saṁsārapāraṁ viya vijjāya pāraṁ gataṁ khīṇāsavaṁ tevijjaṁ chaḷabhiññaṁ vā na eraye na ghaṭṭaye na āsādeyya.
atk-s0508a12:1517_9: Na cattavaṇṇaṁ parisāsu byāhareti attano vaṇṇaṁ guṇaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ nikāmayamāno khattiyaparisādīsu na bhāseyya.
atk-s0508a12:1517_13: kālena sāpadesaṁ pariyantavatiṁ atthasañhitameva vācaṁ bhāsanasīloti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1517_14: Ito aññathā vadantassa vacanaṁ agahaṇīyaṁ hoti.
atk-s0508a12:1518_0: Evaṁ thero saṅkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṁ vatvā tesaṁ guṇānaṁ attani labbhamānataṁ adhimuccitvā
atk-s0508a12:1518_1: bhiyyosomattāya abhippasannaṁ mahājanaṁ ñatvā ‘‘evaṁvidhassa dhammakathikassa vimuttāyatanasannissitassa
atk-s0508a12:1521_0: Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇāti āyasmato cūḷakattherassa gāthā.
atk-s0508a12:1521_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁse
atk-s0508a12:1521_3: kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1521_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā cūḷakoti
atk-s0508a12:1521_6: laddhanāmo vayappatto dhanapāladamane satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto indasālaguhāyaṁ vasati,
atk-s0508a12:1521_7: so ekadivasaṁ guhādvāre nisinno magadhakkhettaṁ olokesi.
atk-s0508a12:1521_8: Tasmiṁ khaṇe pāvusakālamegho gambhīramadhuranigghoso satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo añjana sikharasannikāso nabhaṁ pūretvā pavassati,
atk-s0508a12:1521_9: mayūrasaṅghā ca meghagajjitaṁ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā kekāsaddaṁ muñcitvā tattha tattha padese naccantā vicaranti.
atk-s0508a12:1521_10: Therassapi āvāsagabbhe meghavātaphassehi apagatadhammattā passaddhakarajakāye kallataṁ patte utusappāyalābhena cittaṁ ekaggaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0508a12:1521_12: so taṁ ñatvā kālasampadādikittanamukhena attānaṁ bhāvanāya ussāhento –
atk-s0508a12:1523_0: ‘‘Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino;
atk-s0508a12:1524_0: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayaṁ, subyāpitambu suvalāhakaṁ nabhaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1527_0: Susukkasukkaṁ nipuṇaṁ sududdasaṁ, phusāhi taṁ uttamamaccutaṁ pada’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:1529_1: sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjinoti ete matthake uṭṭhitāhi sundarāhi sikhāhi samannāgatattā susikhā,
atk-s0508a12:1529_2: nānāvaṇṇehi anekehi sobhanehi bhaddakapiñchehi samannāgatattā supekhuṇā,
atk-s0508a12:1529_3: rājīvavaṇṇasaṅkāsāya sundarāya nīlavaṇṇāya gīvāya samannāgatattā sunīlagīvā,
atk-s0508a12:1529_6: morā sikhaṇḍino chajjasaṁvādī kekāsaddaṁ muñcantā nadanti ravanti.
atk-s0508a12:1529_7: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayanti ayañca mahāpathavī susaddalā sundaraharitatiṇā.
atk-s0508a12:1529_8: Subyāpitambūti abhinavavuṭṭhiyā tahaṁ tahaṁ vissandamānasalilatāya suṭṭhu byāpitajalā vitatajalā.
atk-s0508a12:1529_11: Suvalāhakaṁ nabhanti idañca nabhaṁ ākāsaṁ nīluppaladalasannibhehi samantato pūretvā ṭhitehi sundarehi valāhakehi meghehi suvalāhakaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1530_0: Sukallarūposumanassa jhāyatanti idāni utusappāyalābhena suṭṭhu kallarūpo kammaniyasabhāvo tvaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1530_1: nīvaraṇehi anajjhārūḷhacittatāya sundaramanassa yogāvacarassa yaṁ ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyataṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1530_3: accutaṁ padanti evaṁ jhāyanto ca sādhu subuddhassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane sundaranikkamo hutvā suparisuddhasīlatāya susukkaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1530_8: niccasabhāvatāya accutaṁ padaṁ taṁ nibbānaṁ phusāhi attapaccakkhakaraṇena sammāpaṭipattiyā sacchikarohīti.
atk-s0508a12:1531_0: Evaṁ thero attānaṁ ovadantova utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1539_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā thero attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto ‘‘nadanti morā’’tiādinā tāyeva gāthā paccudāhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1542_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁse
atk-s0508a12:1542_3: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ padumaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ rathiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1542_5: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1542_6: rūpasampattiyā anūpamoti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampannatāya kāme pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:1545_0: Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṁ kaliṅgaraṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1548_0: Satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṁ niyojayī’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1550_0: Tattha nandamānāgataṁ cittāti nandamāna abhinandamāna citta abhinandamānaṁ āgataṁ uppannaṁ .
atk-s0508a12:1550_1: Sūlamāropamānakanti dukkhuppattiṭṭhānatāya sūlasadisattā sūlaṁ taṁ taṁ bhavaṁ kammakilesehi ettakaṁ kālaṁ āropiyamānaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1550_3: yena sūlaṁ kaliṅgaranti yattha yattha sūlasaṅkhātā bhavā kaliṅgarasaṅkhātā adhikuṭṭanakā kāmaguṇā ca tena teneva,
atk-s0508a12:1551_0: Tāhaṁ cittakaliṁ brūmīti taṁ tasmā pamattabhāvato cittakaliṁ cittakālakaṇṇiṁ ahaṁ kathayāmi.
atk-s0508a12:1551_1: Punapi taṁ brūmi kathemi cittadubbhakaṁ cittasaṅkhātassa attano bahūpakārassa santānassa anatthāvahanato cittadubbhiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1551_7: Kappānaṁ asaṅkhyeyyampi nāma buddhasuñño loko hoti,
atk-s0508a12:1551_9: laddhesu ca tesu satthāpi dullabhoyeva hoti.
atk-s0508a12:1551_10: Evaṁ dullabho satthā idāni tayā laddho,
atk-s0508a12:1551_11: tasmiṁ laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite āyatiñca anatthāvahe dukkhāvahe akusale maṁ mā niyojesīti.
atk-s0508a12:1551_12: Evaṁ thero attano cittaṁ ovadanto eva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1553_0: Disvāna taṁ ahaṁ buddhaṁ, sayambhuṁ aparājitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1561_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcasaṭṭhime kappe ekasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_3: paccantagāme nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto vanacarako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ upasantaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_5: So tassa upasamaṁ disvā pasannamānaso campakapupphena pūjaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1561_6: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya mātugāmahatthaṁ gato rodati.
atk-s0508a12:1561_7: Brahmalokato kira cavitvā idhāgato yasmā mātugāmasamphassaṁ na sahati,
atk-s0508a12:1561_9: So vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1569_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano pubbenivāsaṁ anussaritvā dhammasaṁvegena –
atk-s0508a12:1575_0: Sabbā gatī samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1576_1: tasmiṁ tasmiṁ bhave ādānanikkhepavasena aparāparaṁ sandhāvanto.
atk-s0508a12:1576_4: Parivattisanti ghaṭīyantaṁ viya paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparāparaṁ parivattiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1576_7: Dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni ñāṇacakkhunā apassanto appaṭivijjhanto,
atk-s0508a12:1576_8: tato eva avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthūnaṁ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano honto gatīsu parivattisanti yojanā,
atk-s0508a12:1577_2: ariyasaccānaṁ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañcā’’ti (mahāva. 287; dī. ni. 2.155; saṁ. ni. 5.1091; netti. 114).
atk-s0508a12:1578_0: Tassa mayhaṁ vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idāni satthārā dinnanayena appamattassa appamādapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0508a12:1578_2: Saṁsārā vinaḷīkatāti saṁsaranti sattā etehīti ‘‘saṁsārā’’ti laddhanāmā kammakilesā aggamaggena samucchinnattā vigatanaḷā nimmūlā katā.
atk-s0508a12:1578_3: Sabbā gatī samucchinnāti evaṁ kammakilesavaṭṭānaṁ vinaḷīkatattā nirayādikā sabbāpi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnā viddhaṁsitā,
atk-s0508a12:1578_4: tato eva natthi dāni āyatiṁ punabbhavoti idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a12:1581_2: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle eko gopālako ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1581_3: So satthari parinibbute aññataraṁ theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa santike buddhaguṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1581_4: sutvā pasannamānaso ‘‘kuhiṁ bhagavā’’ti pucchitvā parinibbutabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘evaṁ mahānubhāvā buddhāpi
atk-s0508a12:1581_8: So kālena kālaṁ bodhirukkhasamīpaṁ gantvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto bodhiṁ vandati.
atk-s0508a12:1581_9: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1581_10: sandhitoti laddhanāmo vayappatto aniccatāpaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammakathaṁ sutvā saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1581_11: paṭṭhapetvā ñāṇassa paripākaṁ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1581_12: So attano pubbenivāsaṁ anussaranto sikhissa bhagavato kāle bodhivandanaṁ buddhānussatiṁ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhañca
atk-s0508a12:1587_0: Tassā saññāya vāhasā, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1589_1: yvāyaṁ etarahi amhākaṁ bhagavato bodhirukkho assattho,
atk-s0508a12:1589_2: etassa ṭhāne tadā sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho puṇḍarīko ṭhitoti so assatthaṭṭhānīyatāya ‘‘assatthe’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1589_4: Apare pana ‘‘assattharukkhamūle nisīditvā tadā buddhānussatiyā bhāvitattā thero ‘assatthe’ti avocā’’ti vadanti.
atk-s0508a12:1589_10: alabhitthaṁ patissatoti buddhārammaṇaṁ ārammaṇassa ekajātiyattā ekaṁ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1589_11: buddhānussatisahagataṁ saññaṁ buddhaguṇānaṁ patipatisaraṇato patissato hutvā alabhiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1590_2: Ito bhaddakappato uddhaṁ ārohanavasena ekatiṁse kappe.
atk-s0508a12:1590_4: yaṁ vā buddhānaṁ aniccataṁ disvā tadanusārena sabbāsaṅkhāresu tadā aniccasaññaṁ alabhiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1590_5: Tassā saññāya vāhasāti tassā yathāvuttāya saññāya kāraṇabhāvena taṁ upanissayaṁ katvā.
atk-s0508a12:1590_6: Patto me āsavakkhayoti idāni mayā āsavānaṁ khayo nirodho adhigatoti imāyeva ca imassa therassa apadānagāthāpi.
